328a5(mdo): par bgyid pa'i rdo myi thog ste// dgra' drang shul gyi stobs can rnams kyis kyang / de dag la gnod pas tshugs myi sridalags so// de dag gi lha dang bdud dang / tshangs pa rnams
328a6(mdo): kyis kyang myi 'jigs so// de bas na sems can de dag ni/ cis kyang myi tshugs pa zhes bgyi lags so// g.yul ngor gcig tu dpa' ba dang / gcig tu khyim thab la myi 'khrul ba'i chung ma dang / seng ge dang
328a7(mdo): sin tu pa'i rta cang shes dang / dge' slong tshul khrims dang / ldan pa 'di rnams ni/ gnod pas tshugs pa lags kyis kyang / jis kyang myi 'jigs pa lags so// de la chad ba dag gyis thams cad bslag
328a8(mdo): ces bgyel ba ni/ 'dir lhag ma yod pa'i don lags pas na/ mdor bsdus pa lag ste so// bdag gis nyams dpag bya zhing / zhes bgyil ba de yang lhag ma yod pa'i don lags te/ dgra' ba
328b1(mdo): pa rnams ni bdag dang myi mnyam mo zhes de ltar 'jig rten du grags so// gal te dgral bcom pa rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / dgral bcom pa rnams kyi srog tu 'du shes pa bsrungs pa lags so// 
328b2(mdo): zhes de ltar blta' ba'i blo chung ngung rnams kyis ning / dgra bcom pa gnas ngan par zhugs lags te/ de ltar bgyis pas srog tu 'du shes pa'i lta ba ngan pas rmongs pa'i 'bras lus/ myur du skye mnar myed pa
328b3(mdo): skye bar 'gyur lags so// gcig tu na gal te dgra bcom pa rnams gsad pa'i sems bsad pa'i bskyed du lags kyang / sems can de dag gyis gsod par myi 'gyur myi srid do// sems can mang po log kyang // de
328b4(mdo): dag gsod pa'i rngo myi thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ srog chags rnams la snying rtse ba'i phyir bdag dang 'dra bar blta'o// dgra bcom pa ni 'tshe ba myed pa'i bsgo nas dang / dpag tu myed
328b5(mdo): pa dang / mtshungs par lta bar bya ste/ de dag la bsad pa'i se// mas bskyed par myi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas ni rgyu myed pa/ don dang dang 'gal ba myi stond to// tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni/ 
328b6(mdo): rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dgas kyi rngon pa las brtsams nas bstand te/ das dgas bsad nas sha dang ldan pa'i zas kyi sbyin pa ya nga spyan drangs nas ngas kyang des spyan drangs pa la gnas nas/ sgra gcan zi nad dang 'dra
328b7(mdo): bapra la khas la tshul kyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces byas so// chad pa dag gis thams cad skrag/ kun la srog ni phangs pa yin// bdag nyid nyams la dpag bya zhing // brdeg par myi bya bsang kyi
328b8(mdo): bya// myig kyang ring du ltos la ring du 'tsho bar gyis shig/ 'tsho ba byed pa'i rtags kyi don khong du chud par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na/ mye'i khyumachog 'jam dpal legs so
329a1(mdo): legs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dgongs pa'i tshig 'di 'dris pa de ni legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyu rad pas/ tshigs su bcad de
329a2(mdo): 'di skad ces gsolang to// sa la mchod pa'i rgyal gyis ni// pa ma gnyis la mchod bgyis na// tha ma la yang gus skya rang la// mnar myed 'jigs par ji ltar mchil// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
329a3(mdo): tshigs su bcang de/ 'di skad ces bkal su lang ho// 'dir ni srid pa'i pa zhes bya// gti mug la ni pa zhes bya// chos 'di gnyis la gang mchod pa// de ni mnar myed 'jigs par 'gro// de nas bcom ldan
329a4(mdo): 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurang pa la tshigs su dad pa 'di skad ces bkal stsa la ho// gzhan gyis dbang / dpa thams cad sdug/ rang rab pacan ni thams cad bder// 
329a5(mdo): rgyal dab pa 'gyur nga kun gyi bzang // dga' ba thams cad bzang bayin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyu rad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
329a6(mdo): chos kyi sgo de skad du bkal stsal pa ni/ legs par bka' stsal pa ma lags te/ 'di na khyim bdag sas zhig gis/ bdag gi bya byis pa'i slob dpon la gtad na/ rtsi lags khye'u de gzhan du dbang du gyurapa/ 
329a7(mdo): pa de/ zhes kyi bkyi lags so// de la gzhan gyis dbang du gyur pa ma lags so// zhes bkyil na yang / don dpa'ags par 'gyur la// de la rab dbang can can lags so// bgyis nas yang / don dang / 
329a8(mdo): 'gal bar 'gyur te/ chos 'di ni shi nang tu brtag dkal bsags so// 'di ni rgyal po'i bu la la bcos su myi rung bar gyu rang te/ de ci yang slob phyi 'tshal nas/ rang dgal dang rang nyam du 'khyam pa/ de la rang / 
329b1(mdo): de la rang dbang can zhes bgyis na ni don dang tshabs cher rgal bar 'gyur la/ gzhan gi dbang bgyu ra to zhes bgyis na ni/ don dang 'gal khar myi 'gyur te/ tshes de ni shind tu brtag dga' ba lags so// 
329b2(mdo): gzhan gyi dbang du gyurd ces bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas ni// de rang dbang du gyur pa na/ sdig pa bgyid pa dang 'gram par 'gyur bas na/ bka' stsald pa 'di ni lhag ma yod pas yi don lags te// de bas na gzhan
329b3(mdo): kyi dbang du gyur pa pa yang ma lags la/ rang dbang can thams cad bdel ba ya ma lags so// nga rgyal dab gyurang kun gyi zad ces bgyil ba de yang lhag a yod pa'i don lags kyi/ ngargyas kyi dbang du gyurapa/ 
329b4(mdo): pa kun myi bzad pa yang ma lags te/ 'di ni la la zhig nga rgyal gyi dbang gyis rab tu byung na/ ci lags rab tu byung ba de la nga rgyal kyi dbang du gyur pa kun myi zad ces bgyi sags sam/ de ni nga rgyal
329b5(mdo): ma mchis pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrim sa dang / chog gi dang ldan pa dang / dbang po srungs pa lags te/ des na nga rkyal kyi dbang du gyur da pa kun myi bzad pa yang ma
329b6(mdo): lags so// dga' ba thams cad bzang ba yin zhes bgyil pa de yang lhag ma yod pa'i don lags kyis/ dga' ba thams cad kyang bzang ba ma lags te/ bstand pa 'di la phab byung ba rnams/ gos
329b7(mdo): tshon can gyi rtags can rnams dang / lhan cig 'khor pa bdag nyid kyis rung bar mtho ba yang sems dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la bzang zhes bgyis na/ don dnga'agal bar 'gyur lag+sa
329b8(mdo): so// bam pa byed byed pa de dag gos kar po gyon du bcug pa de dag ni/ bzang po'i mchog don rgya chen po bgyid pa lags so// pham pa bgyid pa rnams ni rna myi bzang ba zhes bgyil ste/ de dag khum
330a1(mdo): par bgyid pa de dag ni bzang ba zhes bgyi'o// de bas ma dka' ba thams cad bzang ba ma lags na// lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas ci las dgongs te// de skad ces bkas/ 
330a2(mdo): stsa yang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// sangs rgyas ni rgyu myed par don dang 'gal ba myi gsung kyi/ rgyu dang bcas rkye nad dang bcas
330a3(mdo): bar gsung ste// rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzar ma pa'i khyim tu song nas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang du song nas/ bud myed du gyur pa ni
330a4(mdo): gzhan gyi dbang du gyu rad pa yin la/ skyes par gyur pa ni rang dbang can yin no// snyam du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos dang dge la slong gyi dge la 'dun la skyabs su song ste/ de'i
330a5(mdo): rtog la thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du/ gyi dbang du gyur da pa thams cad stug ces tshigs su bcad pa de skad ces gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang
330a6(mdo): na/ myi'i khyu mchog 'jam dpas legs so// legs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dgongs pa'i tshig 'dir la zhus pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal
330a7(mdo): gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa de bkal stsal pa/ thams cad zas la rten pa yin// ser sna myed pa thams cad gsol// zas kyi nyes pas nang du 'gyur// tshangs par spyod dang 'grogs na
330a8(mdo): bde la// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ tsun du'i sbyin pa cher gsol lam/ zhal zas nyes pas bsnyings lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpas
330b1(mdo): la 'di skad ces bka' su yad do// sems can thams cad kyang zas la rten pa ma yin no// ser sna myed pa thams cad kyang g.yol ba ma yin no// chos spyod pa rnams dang 'grogs so cog kyang bdel ba'am
330b2(mdo): yin no// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe khyod ni nad kyis thebs pa de'i tshe/ pa yang nad kyis thebs so// dgra bcom dang ni rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de dag rtag tu zad
330b3(mdo): myed de// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// dgra bcom pa rnams dang // rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni / zhal zas kyang myi gsol
330b4(mdo): lasbyin pa 'i bum zag mang po yang bzhes par mdzad do// sbyin pa blang bar bya ba'i gdams ngag kyang bstond pa mdzad do// / sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dub 'grol dang / 
330b5(mdo): yi dgas kyi rgya mtshol las nges par bsgral ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyi nad pa'i bsngags par mdzad la gsol/ ba ri yang myi mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa lo drug gi bar du
330b6(mdo): dka' ba spyad pas/ nyams chung bar gyur to zhes// sangs rgyas la sems can thams cad dang 'dra bar lta bar myi bya'o// 'dod pa'i rgya bo las rgal ba de dag ni brtan po yin te/ dpa' bo de dag
330b7(mdo): ni/ myi'i yul la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi stobs dang spyod yus yang bsam gyis myi khyab po// sems can thams cad zas la brtend ces bya ba yang lhag ma yod pa'i
330b8(mdo): don yin par shes par bya'o// ser sna myed pa thams cad g.yo' ba yin zhes bya ba de yang lhag ma yod pa'i don yin te/ bdag la ser sA myed pa myi g.yol ba'i bden pa 'gro ba dam pa 'ga' yang yod
331a1(mdo): do// thams cad zas nyes zas nyes nang du 'gyur zhes bya ba de yang lhag ma yod pa'i don yin te// cher mas zug pa las ba sogs pa'i glo'u dag kyang yod do// ches khyod pa rnams dang / 
331a2(mdo): 'grogs pa thams cad bde la zhes bya ba de yang / lhag ma yod pa'i don yin te/ 'jig rten pa rnams la yang chos 'dzind pa rnams dang / 'tsham pa'i chos rnam pa mang po dag yod de/ de dag la yang bya
331a3(mdo): ba sna tshogs yod mod kyi/ spyang pa rnams sna tshogs can/ lus nyon mongs pa de dag/ dang / gal te la la zhig 'grogs par 'gyurang na/ mi bden pa la brten par 'gyur ram/ de ltar na ni don dang 'gal ya
331a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// de bas na sangs rgyas ni n+ya myed par don dang 'gal bra stond par myi mdzad de// gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gyis rgya dang bcas rkye nad dang bcas par ston par shes par gyis shig/ 'jig rtend
331a5(mdo): las 'das pa'i chos ni mchog tu bdel ba yin no// tshigs/ su bcad pa 'di ni// grong khyer gyen tu rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ bram ze lug dpal zhes bya ba las brtsams nas bstan pa yin// 
331a6(mdo): bram ze lug dpal zhig bzhi pa'i bskyad pa byed cing / nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ dus de'i zhag bzhi pa'i sbyang ba'i lta ba bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad zas la brten ces bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di
331a7(mdo): za stan ga de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad ma lus pa ji lta bu
331a8(mdo): legasathams cad ces bgyi ba ya dza lta bu lags/ bka' stsal da pa/ ma lus pa'i don ni dgel ba'i chos thams cad rtag pa'o// bdel ba'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o// de ltar na kha cig ni lhag ma yod
331b1(mdo): pa'o/ kha cig ni lhag ma myed pa yin par chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bus rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa lags
331b2(mdo): te/ bdag shi nang tu rangs lags so bkal sbas da pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// de ltar cha 'phra ba tag nos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po
331b3(mdo): mdos chen po'i bsod nams ji lur skye ba bka' su lang du gsolang // bkal sus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'don bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang / mdo
331b4(mdo): sde 'di'i mying yang tshig tsam du yang nyan pa rnams la brjod pa myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha dang myi dngas de ma yin rnams kyis tshig mthun par tshigs su bcad de gsos pa
331b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kham pa yas bsam yas chos gsung ba// dang dge' 'dun rtag tu khyod la rten// de phyir dgel sro 'od srungs kun dga'o// ma mchis par du 'gon po bzhugs
331b6(mdo): su ga sa// b+he de te'i rgyal po ma skyes gral// khyod kyi mngal ma chog tu zugs 'dra che ba yang // dadungs mchis mthar thug khyod sa gshegs kun ma khyen pa khyod kyis bdag cag the tsom chod/ 
331b7(mdo): denam bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sa 'di sad ces bka' stsas te// bsams mchog bu po 'od srungs dang/ khrel na kun dga' khyod kyis bcom gcod/ khyod kyis pas nas ses rtag pa dang
331b8(mdo): myi rtag shes byas mya ngan ma byed cig/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byab rgyab tu smon da yam btab nas/ 
332a1(mdo): der sems can gang 'ga'i klung gtams phrag dkrigs snyed kyi bye ba'i grangs rnyed kyis sems bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i gnas thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
332a2(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa dang / bram ze'i che zhing mtho' ba 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa la bka' stsal da to// 'gar ba'i pu tsun pa byang chub tu dbang bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
332a3(mdo): de gsuM la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod par gyis shig/ nga rked pa li nad drag pos btab ste/ gzhon nu dag re shig thabs kyi nad brang du nyal par 'dod kyis
332a4(mdo): nyal tu chug cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis 'khor thams cad la tshesu stond cing / seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig/ gnas snyan 'od srungs chen po dang / kun dga' bo gnyis ma 'ongs kyi'ar
332a5(mdo): dU pa khyod la bstand pa 'di gtad kyis/ nam 'ongs pa na/ de gnyis la/ rtod cig ces de skad bkal stsa lad nas/ ba com ldan 'das gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gyis/ nad pa
332a6(mdo): 'i tshul du zhugs par bstanang te/ gzims khang logs su zhur gzigs so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdol chen po/ dam pa'i chos gsung rab thams cad kyi snying por
332a7(mdo): gyu rad pa/ rgyud phyi ma lta bu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas/ gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa'i sgrol/ le'u nyi khri lnga stong yod pa las/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
332a8(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci dang / rigs sngags 'chang dang / srin po las bsogs pa 'dus pa zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u// rdzogs s+ho// 
332b1(mdo): shu log nasum bstong brgyad brgyal mchis// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tha dpa gnyal na kar ba dang / su chen kyi lo cha ba/ ba de bcan tras bsgyur te gnal yab pa// 
332b2(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ a s+ya prad nya pa ra mya ta sa man dA ba tra ma ta ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
332b3(mdo): rol tu phyind pang / kun tu bzang po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga da/ 
332b4(mdo): dkon pa chos kyi snying po na bzhugs te/ phyogs bcu la sangs rgyas zhing chad myed grangs myed pa nas 'dus pa'i/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul 'phra mo dang mnyam pa dang thabs cig
332b5(mdo): go// thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la mnga' rnyes pa/ spyod pa la gnas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems da pa'i kun tu bzang pos/ chos thams cad ni rnam par myi rtog
332b6(mdo): pa bstand pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzind de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtul phra mo dang mnyam pa thams cad g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
332b7(mdo): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag gis dbul la reg par gyu rad to// de ltar reg pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnams kyang / rab tu g.yos par gyur / lha
332b8(mdo): rnams kyis mthun par tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa / 'jig rten bsgron mA lA myi bde la las 'das/ yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu pa rolang phyi dang // srid pa'i mtshol las 'gro ba rab tu bsgol// ded dben
333a1(mdo): khyod kyis rab tu bskyab par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar srab par bya ba'i don
333a2(mdo): shes rab 'dra ba dang / shes rab yin pa la bslab par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skal pa/ kun tu bzang po shes rab 'dra ba ni/ 'jig rtenang tshogs kyi lam rnams kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o// 
333a3(mdo): shes rab gang yin pa ni/ sa dang po yan chad kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkal stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang // lha dang phyir bcas
333a4(mdo): pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu/ dngas pa la mngon par stod do// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo
333a5(mdo): rdzogs so// / rgya kar skad du/ a t+ya ta thA ga ta ma ha ka tur ni de sha nam pa
333a6(mdo): zags na su tra/ bod skad dung / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying chen po bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// bam po dang po / sangs
333a7(mdo): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag kyis thos pa'o dus cig na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri sngon rgyal ba zhugs bzhugs pa/ mchod rten chen
333a8(mdo): bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ byin gyis rlabs pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' mngon par bstod pa / chos kyi gdan lha dang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
333b1(mdo): yin gyis byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba/ chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yon tan chad myed pa las la/ 
333b2(mdo): dag par byang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo na shi nad tu bskor// slob pa'i tshogs shin
333b3(mdo): tu dul ba ni mtha' yas/ chos thams cad la mdo'i dbang ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa yang dag pa'i cho ga ni mkhyend// dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa brnyes/ sems can thams/ 
333b4(mdo): cad kyi bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba/ kun tu 'jom pa la ni mkhas// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyan ma bcad cing / dge slong stong phrag drug bcu'i dge la 'dun chen po dang / thabs
333b5(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ glang po che/ na po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor pa/ rang gi/ don rjes su thob par srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag
333b6(mdo): par shes pas/ sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba shes ma rab shind tu rnam par grol ba// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi 'tsho mos sbyor ba thams cad kun tu bcom pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
333b7(mdo): kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par zad pa/ chos kyi dmyigs pa myed pa las/ nges par byung ba/ khyod las mdzes pa yun gsuM 'tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur dpa/ 
333b8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i ga la shi nang tu zhugs pa ga stag go// byang chubu nga pa'i dge 'dun dpag tu myed pa dang yang thabs gcig ste/ byang rgyal sems dpal sems dpa' chen po// thams cad mkhyen pa
334a1(mdo): chags pa myed pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byang ba/ byams pa chen po snying rje chen po'i chos kyi srin las lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang mos pa'i klog phyung zhing bdud ci'i chu'i char 'bebab pas// 
334a2(mdo): 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong 'khrol ba dang / bral la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi me tog yang dag par 'phel bar byed
334a3(mdo): pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtang bas/ gti mug gyi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi bsnang ba thob par kun tu bstond pa dang / sems can gyi pad ma kha 'byed pa dang / dge'
334a4(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyid par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu bskyems pa dang shes pa'i las kyi mtha' la/ rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu bzla ba lta bur 'gro ba zas/ 
334a5(mdo): cad sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par/ bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba kun tu bstond pa'i rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i gnas
334a6(mdo): rin po che gi nad tu brten dngos bzhi nas/ yul gyi rung thabs cad kyis myi skul cing // 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu bstand pa snang bar gyurd pa/ rgya mtsho chen po
334a7(mdo): ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod/ rgya chen po'i chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bapyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nyer bar 'tsho ba/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po lur bden pa'i rkang pa dang / 
334a8(mdo): byams pa rab tu 'phes pa'i 'jug ya dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthod kyi myig dang / chos thal mo sa skrag pa myed pas pha rol tu nos pa thams cad 'jom pa bskas pa brgyal stong phrag dpag tu myed cing mtha' yas phug pa
334b1(mdo): myed par byang chub sems dpa'i myod pa rgyan ma bcad pas/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang / thabs gcig la 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrub pa myed pa'i lta ba
334b2(mdo): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa/ kun tu ston pa pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i blo
334b3(mdo): gros zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po 'byod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba phyi 'khrugs pa kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po spobs pa/ mtha' yas
334b4(mdo): pa tog kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par yul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po rnam par brtsegs pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer ces bya ba dang / byang chub seMs
334b5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par gnon myi za'i tshig / la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu myed
334b6(mdo): pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de las bstsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag dang / thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
334b7(mdo): sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa myed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu stonang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug
334b8(mdo): bzhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen de// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de yang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
335a1(mdo): chos kyi mdzod 'dzind par mkhyen nas/ 'di snyam tu gang gyi phyir ras byang chub sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su bzung ba dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin
335a2(mdo): gshegs pa'i yul la gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sprug
335a3(mdo): pa myed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi nam grangs yang dag par bstand par bya'o// snyam tu dgongs so// de nas de li tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i tingange 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa rmi la/ 
335a4(mdo): bri bzhin du/ yang dag par stond pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par stsal pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa/ 
335a5(mdo): zhes bya ba de/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ster gyi bar spa pa la 'dod pa'i khams ngas gzu gas kyi bar tu 'khor gyi khyams sangs rgyas kyi gnas de bzhin gshegs
335a6(mdo): pa'i dgel ba'i thabs mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can chad myed pa'i bsam pa tshim par byed pa/ lha'i
335a7(mdo): gzhal phyed khang thams cad zind kyis mnand pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba/ gzhi bye du phyag mazo'i dbyibs dang / 'jam bu sring phyi gser gyi kharang pa dag dang / dpas kyi zhi ga
335a8(mdo): rtababs dag dang / rin po che a sma kar pa'i sgo gang dag dang / nor bu rin po che snying po yi kha khyer dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dga' ba dang / mu tig kyi dog/ 
335b1(mdo): rab tu sbyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / lha'i ngang gyi lda ldi mngon par sbyangs pas sngags pas bstand pa dpag tu myed cing // thug pa myed pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
335b2(mdo): rten gyi khams tsam zhig byang ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi khyams de yang can ngan skyal gyi snying pos bskus pa/ tsan dan gyi dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dra ba yin du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ dri'i o ka ru pad ma'i snying pos btugs pa/ 
335b3(mdo): klu'i mu tika dang rin po che'i me tog kyis rnam par spras pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i bye ma ka sa mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad na rgyan
335b4(mdo): mdzes pa bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de de nyid na kun tu sdong ngo // der gdan seng ge'i khri bye khrag khrig bar+Nastong phrag mang po dpag tu myed pa/ grangs myed pa sna tshogs pa ltal
335b5(mdo): na sdug pa mthong ba rab tu bza pa/ yangs pa/ rgyas pa yid du pa ba'i yang dgal bar byed pa dag byung bar gyurang to// gling bzhi 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir zes smras kha khyer myi bdun gi 'phang tsam gri
335b6(mdo): bskor brkyang dpag chad phyed kyis yongasu bzung ba rin po che in 'dra ni sa dang / ma ta ni las snying por gyur pa brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i gdugs tsan/ tshangs pa'i ne tsho mchil dang rin po/ 
335b7(mdo): che ser pos smras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba/ kun tu spyod pas sgra byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa drang ba/ ma yo ba bzhi 'a stong byung bar gyur
335b8(mdo): to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi la ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them sras chen
336a1(mdo): po dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyu rang to// bcom ldan 'das teng nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma
336a2(mdo): thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ snab ba chen po yang byang bar gyurang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig nyan
336a3(mdo): thos kyi tshogs dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / nyan thos kyis tshegs kyis mdun du khadang to// lha dang klus mngon par stod cing me tog kyi char chen pos ni 'bebs/ na/ 
336a4(mdo): bza' chen pos ni mngon par 'bebs/ phye ma dang phyag pa'i chaden po mi 'thong / mim sbyin dang / sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs// 'jig rtend kyi khams dpag tu myed pa ni rab tu
336a5(mdo): g.yol bar mngad/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa ni sA bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / 
336a6(mdo): sangs rgyas khyu mchog tu gyur pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzil brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ 
336a7(mdo): chen pos/ bya rgod phung po'i ri las myi snang bar gyur te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dpa lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag tu ma zham ring du 'brang
336a8(mdo): zhing / nor bu rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi them sras kyi dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba dem gshegs so// de nas rgyal ze chen po bzhi la spogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ 
336b1(mdo): ldan 'das them sras su bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog gyi srin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi/ 
336b2(mdo): zla me dzang nor bu li 'do dang lha'i 'od shi nad tu dri myed pa/ thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zi nad kyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi khar mdzad// ri kho ri rab dang ni 'khor yug rtse mo bsnyen te/ zhing rna pa
336b3(mdo): gsol bar gyur papas dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabs su mchil// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa/ 
336b4(mdo): 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las stso gus pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
336b5(mdo): zem smras su zhugs par rig nas// bcom ldan 'das la ma chong pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i spos kyi srin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
336b6(mdo): stod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dam pa rnyes shing rab tu mtshangs pa myed pa rnam par 'phrul pa shind tu ston du/ rgyal ba nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te/ zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rab tu gang lan skyabs rang kyis so/ 
336b7(mdo): tan kun kis zhing rnams thams cad brgyan te shi nang tu mdzes mdzad pa// gang zhig shind tu mnyan myed mtshungs pa myed cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur nga la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis
336b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'das mngon par stod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhab ring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe ma la bsogs pa mtshe ma'i lha nas kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su
337a1(mdo): gzhugs par rigasas cos ldan 'das sa mdzad pa'i las kyi phyim lnga len 'ams srid kyi maras 'atul ba kye/ thal mo sbya nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// de bang gshegs pa
337a2(mdo): khyod kyis mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas sems can bsam pa mkhyend// mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi dus gsum dag la chags myed thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi myod ba zas
337a3(mdo): tha ma khyed/ des na srid pa gsum po dgan lus can rnams kyis mched par 'os// de nas mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon pam bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
337a4(mdo): nam ma cu 'brang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan las sogs pa/ dga' ldan kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them snyas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 
337a5(mdo): lha'i rin po che'i blon gyir rab tul ba ste/ thal mo s+yam das la tse/ ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa gang gi srad tu skra dang yi ke ma mchis pa gang du'ang rgyab ma mchis pas/ khyod kyis chos rnams
337a6(mdo): gsa'abs yi gyur stsas smyig rgya 'drang ma khye nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na/ chos kyi dngos po la rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag myed gsung ba'i phyi
337a7(mdo): sa bya tshal lo// de nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ma tshig bcad pa 'dis mngon par bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'am 'bring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul las
337a8(mdo): babyogs pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them ska su zhug pa par rig nas twa/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i rgyan gyi srin gyi char rag stsal ba ste/ thal mo s+yar nas bcom ldan
337b1(mdo): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'angs mngon par stod pa/ chos kyi zong kyis rang gyi stobs bcu mkhal 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang // thugs rjel rnyes nas byams pa dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs bsten/ 
337b2(mdo): kha margyal ches la gnyis su byed par thugs kyang rgyal pas tshungs par mkhyed/ tshas kyi khyam par sem sa lan des sun grub pa'i rgyal sa phyag 'angs so// de nas 'phrul ngan 'i zhernapas kyis
337b3(mdo): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngom par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhapa ring nu 'anang bar kyar to// de nas lnga'i rgyal po dbang sbyar las thogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams lam / 
337b4(mdo): ldan 'das bem smras su zhugs pa dang / 'tshar kyi khyam su mdo/ par phyogs pa mdzin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i rnalas kyi phyir/ mug ti gyi nal gyi ldan gyi char ras byab ba ste/ 
337b5(mdo): byed ze ldan rgyam tshol 'an par gnas shing med las nas thos dbang gyur zhabs la byan 'ams so// rnams kyis byam pa dang ldan pa'i thugs rje mo sa ni bdel ba 'i lam gyi rnams la rab tu gnas mdza pa/ nas nga
337b6(mdo): 'tshogs kyis bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur dpa// bde gshegs pang sa la ni gyi chos pag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag gsol la ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pa/ bcor 'grus mtshungs pa ma
338a1(mdo): stobs kyis yang dag 'phags// yul gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos myi g.yo ba// sangs rgyas ring po dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mnga' bdag thugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil
338a2(mdo): 'khor rnam dgra prang // blo rter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'jom mdzad pa// sems can brgya la dag gyis ni mang po mchod gyu rad pa// bde la gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' ltar zhi
338a3(mdo): ba'i rnam par tha rad pa'i lam gshegs pa// shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gongs shing // skye bo mang po mtshungs myed pad ma kha 'byed pa// sangs rgyas nyi ma ngas pa khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// 
338a4(mdo): mde'i bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yA// / 'dren pa khyod dang mnyam par myigs par ma gyu rang te// khyod da ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags// bdag cag khyod la
338a5(mdo): bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags// lha dang klu deng lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa// lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon stod pa// bsngags pa brgyal phrag mad bos yang dag
338a6(mdo): mngon sod pa// 'del bar gshegs pa stong 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
338a7(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhes ring du 'brang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par skul pa/ tshad myed pas lta ba rgya phrag stong kyis mngon par stod nasana'i khodza gyi
338a8(mdo): rin po che bkod par gshegs te// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'dir// them sras nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs par shes pa de bzhin
338b1(mdo): da stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling ba'i pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gsheg so/ ma shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
338b2(mdo): 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba rin po che bkod par ga na seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams la zhugs so// byang chub sems dpal dang/ nyan thos chen po dgar kyang / bstan da ji
338b3(mdo): rigs pa la 'khod par bya rang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind rnam par tha rad pa'i sgrib pa myed pa las/ sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms
338b4(mdo): par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind rnam par thard pa bsgrib pa byed pa la/ sangs rgyas nyam par mo bang pa zhes bya bas snyoms par zhugs pa zag tu// de nas coM
338b5(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sku spu'i khung pu re re nas kyang / 'od zer/ gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed phyung ste/ byung nas kyang shar bya/ gas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so// de bzhin
338b6(mdo): du lho dang / nub dang bya gyi phyogs rnams dpang / 'og dang bste pa dang/ phyogs 'jams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zas so snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi las rnams snang bar byas so// 'ang
338b7(mdo): rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byas ma thag tu de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyan bcad do// byol song kyi myig nas pa'i sems can nas
338b8(mdo): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsdug sngal gi tshor ba yang rgyun gcod do// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyurd cing / zhe sdang kyis ma yin/ 
339a1(mdo): gti mug kis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis gnod par ma gyu rang to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyu rang to// byang chub
339a2(mdo): sems dpa' yang dag par bskyal ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // gang gyis brtson 'grus stobs ni mthal yas yongs brtan pa thams
339a3(mdo): kyu rang te// kar gyis tshon 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs brgya rnams na mthul ldan rab brjod pa// shag kya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba zas
339a4(mdo): cad spang bar byed pa mdzes gang chos rgya chen po myed mnyam pa de de liHdbas la phyag 'tshal te/ mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni ba skal pa grangs myed rtag tu nyan blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub
339a5(mdo): sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim bskyed pa// thub pa des ni gang phyir sa mas can bdel bar bzhed pas 'od 'di phyung // mngal zad/ gang zhig brtson 'grus gis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas
339a6(mdo): lam mdza nas/ pad ma byang ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu ri rab ji bzhin mdzes// gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa// de'i chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag pa
339a7(mdo): don cen gsum du rkyal ba gshegs su gsol// rab tu bskor bar ma kya rang mtshungs pa myed cing rgyal ba kun gyis khasgyur ba// 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs che phyir ni de ring bskor bar mdzad// sro
339a8(mdo): chan pa rnam kyi ma bstend par rnyed dkal legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur// ka bdag dad pa dpa' chen yangs don du gnyer ba dag de ring ltos// de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs
339b1(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag gis gos par byas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par sul// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab thug yol bar byas/ sems can thams cad bdel bar byas// nyon mongs pa
339b2(mdo): khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs mun pa mun naka thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khams thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu myed pa dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
339b3(mdo): myi mched tu slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbya'i phyag tu myi snang bar gyu rang to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed rnam dag rin cen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyan
339b4(mdo): myi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i// sangs rgyas kyi zhing lajig rten gyi zhing gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i na po che'i bsod nams bkod pas/ rgya che ba dang ldan pa na byang chub
339b5(mdo): seMs dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ zhes bya ba/ 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ga'i grungab bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing
339b6(mdo): mdun du bdang de/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyi sdang bar gyu rang nas skad cig tha cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mched 'dir phyi rang te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par/ bcom
339b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan stong phrag bcur bskor pa byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i dong bu bye du r+ya'i/ 
339b8(mdo): dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs myed yon tan pha rol da byi nad// khyod kyi yon tan sngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun
340a1(mdo): na brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis shing gang yon tan ter// der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchil// chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom
340a2(mdo): ldan 'das dri phyed 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyend kyang // shin tu bsrabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal// sems can rnam par dkrol spang tha dang bstand pa mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i
340a3(mdo): dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// shar phyogs log su gnas te/ rang gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yul pa'i rang rang kyi stand dag
340a4(mdo): la 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
340a5(mdo): srog shing zhes bya ba'i 'od des bskul ma thag tu// byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdung bdar te/ ldan gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
340a6(mdo): de nas myi snang bar gyur nas// skad cig thar cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed 'dir phyi nang te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas nges
340a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / gser gyi drabs bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ 
340a8(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i shin gyi 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas// 'od kyi klog phyang stong pa bdag myed sgra bsgrags te// yan
340b1(mdo): lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi chu'i sa zhi mdzad cing / dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel pa 'phel bar mdzad// bde la gshegs shes rab 'od kyis kati mug mun bsal nas// ring nas srid
340b2(mdo): mchor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de// lam yang bstand cing sred pa dag kyang bskams par byed/ tha dad pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi myig kyang rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems
340b3(mdo): dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chang pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ sgo phyogs log su ga nas te/ rab kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi spobs kyis sprulang ba ling b.ras kyi bdun pa
340b4(mdo): 'khod de// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpal sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs
340b5(mdo): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul la thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun tu bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ras kyi snang bar
340b6(mdo): gyu rang nas/ bzhad rtsig thang cig ud tsas de la 'jig chen kyi khams kyi mjed 'dor phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin pa yi bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas// de nas bcom ldan
340b7(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor mu tig gi do shal gyi dra bas/ bcom
340b8(mdo): ldan 'das la mngon par bka' ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod do// / khyed kyi sku'i 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing // smon lam dge' bas dag
341a1(mdo): ga pa bye sa khrag yang ldan// ni mye ngan pa yang dag cing zag pa myed pa des// phyogs brgya'i sangs rgyab zhing rnams bsam gyis myi khyab gsal// khyod kyi tshig ni rgyan chags gsal zhing mtshungs/ 
341a2(mdo): po ste/ 'gro bas bas ma dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tsam bgyid// sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang myi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
341a3(mdo): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa chad myed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rab kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis stsal pa'i rang rang kyi skand dag la lun
341a4(mdo): ro// de nas bya phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' sa rin cen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi kham// klas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo mchog rgya mtshol zhes byab
341a5(mdo): 'od des bskul ma bag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ga'i klung bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun tu bad tre/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyi sdang bar gyur nas/ skad cig zang cig
341a6(mdo): yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'dir phyi rang te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ma 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go 'os phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
341a7(mdo): ldan 'das la lan spong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bco bu ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor chu'i dgas dang rin po che'i dru bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di
341a8(mdo): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bzod do/ 'angs bu'i gling gser bcos sa shung med ba'i bu// kun nas spyan mang 'phyogs bricu dag tunam par mdzes// mtshungs byed yul sems can gang da se
341b1(mdo): tog pa// de dag sbyor myed pa de zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis yir ba brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du// 'jig rten mkhyend pa mtshungs myed rgyal ba bltas kyang ni// de yis rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang btson
341b2(mdo): 'grus kyis// rnam par skul bapas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong myi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// byang phyogs logs su gnas te// rang
341b3(mdo): gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis srul pa'i rang rang gyi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas shar dang lho'i mtshams phyogs na// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan myed pa
341b4(mdo): nabyang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba yod pa des skul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpal ga pa 'ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor bdud du ba dang te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang ba
341b5(mdo): byur de// skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams myi ma jeng de 'dir phyi nang te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa bco ldan 'ad kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
341b6(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldas 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab s+ho/ tshigs su
341b7(mdo): bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// su'i sa mthal dpung ma mchis pa'i bla nad kyang // sems can rnams la myi gnod zhing la myi gnod pas// myig mying rnams kyis rgyal ba'i pyod
341b8(mdo): yul 'tshal bar dga'// sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin kyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing gcig phyogs la zhing mang rab 'byas ston mdzad de// kun tu bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// 
342a1(mdo): pa chen po dag ldan me 'drar gyur de la// dpag myed rdzu 'phrul rnam par skul pas de stonang to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis/ 
342a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// shar dang khro la phyogs 'tshams logs su gnas te// rang gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis stsal pa'i rang rang gyi stan dag 'khod do// de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tsham
342a3(mdo): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams myig bzang po na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems dpa' zhes bya ba
342a4(mdo): 'od des bskyal ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ga'i klung bca'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyi snang bar gyur nga nas// skad cig zang cig/ 
342a5(mdo): yud tsam de la 'jig rtend kyi khams myi mjed 'dir phyi nga te/ 2khor gyi khyams ring po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo nga
342a6(mdo): phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das sa mchod pa li las byed cing na ba za'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su
342a7(mdo): bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// sems can dam pa ka yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du// tshul khrims dri myed nor bu rin cen 'dra ba srung // tshul khrims myed gzigs
342a8(mdo): mgon po shi nad tu zug je zhing // bdag la bstod pa myi mjed gzhas la srong phyi ma dzang // ri rab ji bzhin khyod brtan tha ma rgya chen ston // mu tor zab mo bzhinas du gnad tu gting dpag dga'// srid bdog par/ 
342b1(mdo): bcings par kun nas grol ba ste/ sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpal bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis/ bcom
342b2(mdo): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pas/ lho dang nub kyi 'tshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rab gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rab gyi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub byang gyi 'tshams phyogs
342b3(mdo): na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dang / 
342b4(mdo): gapa 'aka'i klung bcu'i byed ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun tu bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang ba kyar de nas/ skad cig zang cig sung tsam de la 'jig rten kyi
342b5(mdo): khams myi mjed 'dir phyind te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che ba kod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// brtsa
342b6(mdo): ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste// tshigs su bcad la 'di gnyis kyis
342b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod do// sring ba'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ byed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos po myed par bsto dang / skyams sa bu'i sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad
342b8(mdo): kyang 'di ni sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis// dper na myi zhig gnyid kyis/ log pa'i rmyi lam na// gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags// 'dus byas dngos
343a1(mdo): po la mchis rmyi lam 'dra bar gzungs// chos rnams snang yang 'di ni chos la tshogs ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpal de dag kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis/ 
343a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gyi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rab kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yul la 'i rang rang gyi stamal 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams
343a3(mdo): phyogs na// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma myed pa rnam par sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag dri ma myed par rab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha'
343a4(mdo): yas dri ma myed ces bya ba 'od de bskul theg tu/ byang chub sems dpal ga 'daga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te// lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur da nas/ 
343a5(mdo): skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams myi mched 'du phyind te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom lda na 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das
343a6(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bsko ba la byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la sachod pa thol pa byed cing rtag tu sba 'byung ba la sil bstan gyi dra bas/ bco
343a7(mdo): ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste// tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod do// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhil mos// khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma
343a8(mdo): byed par mkhyend// khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyerang // sems can gcig gi khyod bzhin sems can kun gyi myad // gang
343b1(mdo): ragazhus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyend// sems cad 'du shes kyi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes phyir// 'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan// de napa byang chub sems dpa'
343b2(mdo): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa chad myed pa dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams log su gnas te/ rang kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis skum
343b3(mdo): pa'i rang rab kyi bstan dag la 'ang khod do// de nas 'os kyi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen ud pa la dmar po 'i dpas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'jig rten kyi khams rnam par snang byed tu snang ba na/ 
343b4(mdo): bya chub sems dpal spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba yod des pa sul sa bag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' ga ka' bcu'i bye nyid kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ lan cig tu
343b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig zang cig ud tsam de la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mched 'ding phyind te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par/ bcom
343b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go' bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong zag bcur bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod las
343b7(mdo): byed cing nor bu rin po che'i klu kyi 'phreng gyi nga bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste// tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gale te pyod zhing na ji snyeste
343b8(mdo): rdul ma mam pa/ de snyed bde la gshegs mas po rgyal po'i drung lhags te// bskal pa bye stong ma po zhi ba gus pa de// thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis ko par mdzad// zo mkhas rab rdzogs shes rab shind/ 
344a1(mdo): tu rdzogs// gzugs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te// bskal pa ma pa po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // skra ces rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par myi nus so// de nas
344a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpal de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad myed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'og gyi phyogs logs su gnas te// rang gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
344a3(mdo): stsal pa'i rang rang gyi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas steng gyi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sba bsgrags mchog kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig g+hi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa
344a4(mdo): chos thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskyalam thag tu byang chub tu byang chub sems dpal gang 'ga'i klung cu'i bye ma snyen kyis yong su bskor cing mdun tu bdang te/ 
344a5(mdo): lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyu ra nasaskad cig zang cig yud tsam do la 'jig rtend kyi khams mye mjed 'di phye dang te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che/ 
344a6(mdo): bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan
344a7(mdo): 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i g.yer kis+tha 'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste// tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis
344a8(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod do// bde la gshegs sku'i 'brin las mtha' dang dubus ma mchis// mtha' yas gsung thugs dam pa myin pa'i spyod yul myin// de ni sangs rgyas
344b1(mdo): mkhyen kyi sems can gzhan gyis sbyin// dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skyes pa myi rnyed bzhin// mtshangs myed yod pa mtha' dbur byed pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'od te mya ngan 'dus/ 
344b2(mdo): sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang chad ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa chad myed de/ 
344b3(mdo): dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gyi bar sna pa la dong ste/ rang kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis stsal pa'i rang rang kyi lha nang dag la 'khod do/ de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang/ 
344b4(mdo): rgyab sems dpa' brgya 'dus pa las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad myed pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu// skad cig thangag yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams myi mched 'dir phyin
344b5(mdo): te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyend bzhin du// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 
344b6(mdo): gsung gsul ba'i sgra mdzad nas/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stor chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis gos par gyu rang te// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di naka/ 
344b7(mdo): dag dad pas dang zhing snod du gyurd pa'i dge la slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dgel bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mying dang phyi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gsal ba'i bskrad thos na
344b8(mdo): lus dang sems tshim par gyu rad te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them sbas dag nas skad cing zang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po cher bkod pa phyi nad te// de dag kyis gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
345a1(mdo): la 'gol phyag 'tshal nas// phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'cham pa'i stan de dag la 'khod do// gsung gastsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs pa'i 'dun du 'don
345a2(mdo): dang / tshangs pa'i kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad myed 'od dang / 'od gsal ba dang / dge chung dang / tshad myed dge 'a dang / dge' rgyas dang / srin myed dang / bsod nas
345a3(mdo): 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can dang / myi che ba dang myi gtung ba dang / gya nam snang dang / shind tu mtho ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas/ skad cig thar cig yud tsam
345a4(mdo): de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyi nad te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nasastan da rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
345a5(mdo): 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyend nas// sbyin 'akyi mdzod spu nas/ byang sems dpa' stobs nyes par ston pa zhe sa bya ba'i 'od gzer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i
345a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor myi sdang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal kyi snying po/ chos zas
345a7(mdo): la dbang bsgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu de'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' me to// 
345a8(mdo): dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms sugs ma thAg du/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khams chen po che bkod pa'i dbus nas/ 
345b1(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gang na seng ge la zla ba du shong tal bye ba khrag zhig pasu stong phrag bcu cas su ma thol ba na po semams cad kyis smras pa kho khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa sangs bkod pa mam pa
345b2(mdo): bting pa me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bre re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa// byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad kyis yang ngas par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi myig gyis
345b3(mdo): bsdus pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du stond pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung byar gyurang to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyis snying po chos thams cad la
345b4(mdo): rabang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ka dan seng ge'i khri bskal pa bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par skul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzind de las langs te/ gus
345b5(mdo): pa dab bcas zhing / zhes bcas par bas ma sbyar nas/ bcod ldan 'das la tshog su bcad de gsol ba/ nyi ma 'od kyi te 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/ lha rab pagazi ba'id / 
345b6(mdo): tan sum bcu dga'// tshangs pa'i dbyings kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na par mdzes// sangs rgyas macu'i yul gyis rnam par yul ze 'di // chos rnams dbang sgyum nas mkha'i rang bzhin g.yol ba
345b7(mdo): byed// sgyu ma smyig rgya lta bu chu'i zla 'dra zhing // rje myed byed pa po dang tshor po myed par// mkhyend nas 'gon po 'dir ni rnam par bsgrub pa bston // bkod pa sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can
345b8(mdo): byin// rnam bsgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro// bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dral// rnam par bsgrub dag gi ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gyi
346a1(mdo): sems rgyan ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal la// de la gro 'ur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so// rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems krol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam med pa
346a2(mdo): sna tshogs ston// sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin cen sna tshogs kun tu bstan// gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can byed pa 'dul kya rang ba// khyed kyis seng ge'i
346a3(mdo): khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi 'breb ba bsgreng // de ni kang du'ang 'grol ba ma mchis 'od ma mchis// khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyend nas
346a4(mdo): kyang // sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs bston // tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu spangs pa'i ga su pa// 'jig rten bsgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi' 'arjid
346a5(mdo): mgabadag la thugs tshe'i srad du 'dzegs te gdon la bzhugs / rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos pand gsol// khyod sa bsnyen bkur bgyid dang chos ni mnyan srad du// na dag sems
346a6(mdo): can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags// gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de gsal du gsol// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub seMs
346a7(mdo): dpal me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sbyang ba'i lhag pa'i bsas pa mkhyend nas// gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa
346a8(mdo): banyes nas/ byang rgyab sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrib pa myed pa'i bsko zhes bya ba'i chos kyi zham grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmyigs pa dang / sangs
346b1(mdo): kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang stobs bcu dpa / myi 'jigs pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgong 'gro ba so so yang dag par/ 
346b2(mdo): rig pa la rnam par gdon gyi za ba la gzhol ba'i sgo 'dug pa/ mngon par thos pa chen po la ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir gyi ldog par sa tsam la gyi skye ba lanapa 'gron dpa// cen
346b3(mdo): cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'gyu la/ chos kyi dbyings rgyatshul gcig tu ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems cad thams cad bsam pa dang dbang po 'jug pa ston pa/ snying po dang ldan pa
346b4(mdo): chos thams cad la gdon myi za bas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams dad rnam par 'joms pa byed pa tshul bzhin chos kyi rgyal la gzhonas lar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar 'gyur ba thams cad
346b5(mdo): 'dul ba/ chags pa myed pa'i ye shes su 'jug pa/ thug pa myed par yongs su bsngo ba mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes/ bston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes pa
346b6(mdo): 'jug pa/ chags pa myed pa'i byin brlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par nges par bsngond pa/ rtog pa myed pa dang rnam par rtog pa myed pa mnyam pa myed pa nyid du 'jug pa/ 
346b7(mdo): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan
346b8(mdo): pa dran pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad myi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas/ 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden tshul la 'dug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus
347a1(mdo): dpangag dang sems rab tu bden par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang sgyur ba rab tu rtog pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i
347a2(mdo): phyir/ chos thams cad dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal la 'jug pa/ 'di lta bu'i chos kyi nam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstand pa dang / nyan thos pa dang / bshad pa dang / klag pa dang / bzung ba dang / rnam par
347a3(mdo): shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tsom thams cad
347a4(mdo): gcad pa'ang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad char bcad pa dang da/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongasu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan
347a5(mdo): 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstand/ pa// bam po gnyis pa la
347a6(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin cen klog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms por zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi
347a7(mdo): rgyan gyis brgya nad par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpalta sbags pa stobs kyis rgyal bos par ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
347a8(mdo): thams cad dang spen pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog ki ldalnga ldi dang / me tog kyi phur ma rnams byin kyis rlabs te/ me tog kyi lda ldi dang me tog gyi phur ma de dag kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 
347b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpal blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba li ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams
347b2(mdo): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi su'i khung bu thams cad tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'idri byid kyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpal 'od zer dri ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
347b3(mdo): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mthal yas pa byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems dpa'as
347b4(mdo): myig myi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da la snyoms par zhug/ sa nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs/ pa la mngon par phyogs shing myig myi 'dzums par byin gyis
347b5(mdo): brlabs so// de na sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dang / blo mtha' yas dri myed kyi chos la mchog tu dgal ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang
347b6(mdo): ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing / chos la dgal ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyad bkod nas/ rab tu zhi ba dang ldan
347b7(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'
347b8(mdo): chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjod pa myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/ byang chub sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs
348a1(mdo): pa la dmyigs pa myi brjed par gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bos zild kyis myi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
348a2(mdo): la snyoms par zhugs nas// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpal bdud rab tu 'jom pa
348a3(mdo): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i ting nge 'dzind de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsuM gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud bye ba phrag brgya la ji snyed pa de dag zas
348a4(mdo): cad dpung dang bcas te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ myur ba myur bar rings su rang rang gyi bdud kyi gnas nas myi snang bar gyur da te// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'ad
348a5(mdo): kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa na pa brgya stong phrag tu mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas shing / zhes
348a6(mdo): dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol// bdel bar gshegs pa chos
348a7(mdo): bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpal bdud rab tu 'jom pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing / sran cad sems can rnams la myig dang bral ba'i las// phyi bgyid
348a8(mdo): ngo// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba gsol cig dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi khang rgya mchis te/ bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs
348b1(mdo): dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsalang ngo to// grogs po dag legs so legs so// gang gis phyir khyod kyi bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob
348b2(mdo): shig dang de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper
348b3(mdo): na mun pa mun nag lo par gsags pa ni/ mar gyi cig gis myed par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brkyar bsags pa yang / ye shes kyi stobs skyed
348b4(mdo): pa cig gis myed par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dpe ra na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po cig gyis/ mun pa mun nag thams cad
348b5(mdo): sel to// grogs po dag de bzhin du/ dge' ba'i sems lhag/ mthong dang ldan pa gcig gyis myi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag/ thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dgel ba'i
348b6(mdo): rtsab 'dis rims kyis myi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dug
348b7(mdo): par gyur te// 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlabs so dang / kun tu bsta dad pa 'di nibs kyis myi khyab de
348b8(mdo): deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la 'jug par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa myed pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed par thecom ma mchis so// de ci'i
349a1(mdo): srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni/ che ste bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon
349a2(mdo): par shes pa'i ye shes/ chen pos rnam par ros phyogs bcur sgra bsngags pa/ sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma ma mchis par rig pa dang / na par grol bas snang bar 'gyur nga pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod
349a3(mdo): cing bsngags pa/ chos thas cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sbyar ba// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyis pha rol pa tu sond pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa bdud kyi las dang / bcod pa dang nyon
349a4(mdo): mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ pha rol tu rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi 'dul ba/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye la bu bstand pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
349a5(mdo): chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du tu son pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang gzungs dang ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/ byin gyis rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing
349a6(mdo): spobs pa rgyan gyi 'chad ba/ seMs can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa zhes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos stonod pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na mthon
349a7(mdo): ma mchis pa'i chos stod pa sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang shad la mkhas pa/ myi 'am ci dang bya ka la ming ka dang / khrung zhud kyi sgra dang tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can gin tu bzhes gnyen bgyid pas/ sems can lams
349a8(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bkod pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can brtan zhing shi nang tu gnas la myi g.yol zhing / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag
349b1(mdo): bar bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje skamasra zhing / myi shigs pa'i 'khor yug lta bu/ smond pa la mchis pa'i smon lam pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la dga' zhing shind tu gnas la/ chang pa dang rtag pa'i mtha'
349b2(mdo): gnying ka dang / sba bar gyurang pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi 'tshams sgom pa yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gum pa/ ded dpon chen po bskas pa grangs byed par/ 
349b3(mdo): chos rin po ches bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gsol bam bgyid pa// seng ge le sgra chen po sgrogs
349b4(mdo): tha/ sdem na ma rkyang dang / skyi lu chugs kyi rgyang thams cad dang / de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa la gyi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe' byar bzang pos sus legs par brkya nga ba// ka
349b5(mdo): pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpal pa/ bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i yul 'dul ba// mnyan ba lta 'ur gyu rang pa dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
349b6(mdo): lan dpabasas gtan dang / rnam par 'arang ba dang / ting nge 'dzind dang rtsom pa par 'dug pa/ gnang tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu bsgol pa la 'chan pa/ ri ba lta phur
349b7(mdo): kya ra pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / marnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / grags pa ma mchis pa dang / spang pa dang / bstod pa dang / bdel ba dang sdug bsngal ba las log par dka' ba dang / dang ba
349b8(mdo): dang / mchog tu dgal ba'i ma la sems zhugs pa/ chos rin pa menam par 'thor pa/ shes rab kyis 'ongs nas rnams par bgyid pa bangs lta bya chus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis ya gos pa/ 'od kyi dbyes
350a1(mdo): 'khor rnam par dag pa zla ba dang nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i 'od mgo mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind rab tu thob pa tshe tshwa rin po che thams cad yang dag par gzhol
350a2(mdo): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi gcod pa sems thams cad yongs su sbyin par bgyid pa dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'chal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzind pa/ 
350a3(mdo): bsngags pa mthal yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa bsod nams chang ma mchis pa/ bsags pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i
350a4(mdo): mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar myi phyin dpa 'di lta bu nas kyi 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pas/ nges par 'byung ba bsgrib pa myed pa'i sgo
350a5(mdo): zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa zhes pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par gyu rad pa// sems can thams cad tsha
350a6(mdo): par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge' ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs
350a7(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyas gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig
350a8(mdo): gso thegs pa'i byang rgyab sems dpa'i nas kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu chung byil / nges pa'i sems can rnams sa kyis nye bar bskul ba/ ma nges kyi sems can rnams su snying rje chen po nye bar 'grub ma// so/ 
350b1(mdo): pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams 'jud pa/ theg pa gsul mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par 'god pa ston pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du
350b2(mdo): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so// de ci'i sa du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyu rad nas/ ngo mtshar rmad tu byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
350b3(mdo): 'das skyes bu de pa 'di dag gis 'khor gi khyams 'dir/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgyal phrag stong du yang
350b4(mdo): stond pa'i rngo myi thog go// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// e ma ji tsam byo gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rna par stsal pa'i tshe phrul 'di lta bu mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs
350b5(mdo): rgyas kyi theg pa khang / re ba bskyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam byed do// de ci'i srad du zhe/ na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
350b6(mdo): bskyed pa nyid kyis ha nyan thos dpar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zild kyis non pa'i srad tu'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi myi la la zhig/ nor
350b7(mdo): bu rin po chen bye ru ru bor nas/ nor bu 'ching bu la dmyigs pa snyam du selas dpa' dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas// nyan thos dpa rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmyigs par bkyilab
350b8(mdo): snyam du ses dpa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyi bdag la gang ngo // bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sems zag pa nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses
351a1(mdo): bskyed pa dang/ bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ring por myi legs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbang phyug gyi rgyal pos bstand pa 'di bshad
351a2(mdo): pa na/ lho rang myir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de ltar srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsu bcus/ bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'du
351a3(mdo): pa'i le'u// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de gzig ts+tsha nas/ me ma byang chub sems dpal 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ chos don tu
351a4(mdo): gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen/ de nas/ byang chub ses ba'i myong ba la 'jug pas/ nges pad 'byung ba'i bsgon me myed po 'i gro'i li lu chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bzhad
351a5(mdo): pa'i phyir myi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer skye/ sa bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyur ma zag tu de nas/ de thams cad dang
351a6(mdo): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpal gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus lan brgyad skor ba byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' gzung
351a7(mdo): kyi dbang phyug kyi rgyal po'i gyi gtsug tu myi snang bar gyur to// 'od des byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de la reg pa zag tu de nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpal
351a8(mdo): gzungs kyi dab ga gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / seng ge'i khri dang lus brgyal gyu rang du zi lad kyi gnas nas/ lA ma me ldan ne'o// de nas sems dpal gzugs kyi dbang phyag rgyal
351b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal
351b2(mdo): mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shu'i gtsug gyi drang zad gyi steng gi bar sAng la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba/ yu pa ni bye du r+ya/ g.yogs ma ni gaper/ snying po
351b3(mdo): ni rin po che'i ne tso'o ci/ rtsibs ni In 'dra ni la las byas pa mu tig gyi do sha rab tu sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga lI mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis
351b4(mdo): bzung la/ rgyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis rlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la chod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis rba
351b5(mdo): nas// me tog kyi char yang phab ste// sil snyan dang sgra dbyad sa rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas// / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
351b6(mdo): bstod do// kun sAng kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus stond pa kun nas spyan rab 'byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// bsam gyis myi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan// skyes khu khyu mchog gyis ni 'od
351b7(mdo): zer byung // zhal yang rnam par myong zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa des ni bdag gi lus la yang // lan brgyar skor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi// myi'i 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis
351b8(mdo): sngon thob dran pa dang // blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs// rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyu rang / bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi bro gros dka' mgu' nyes
352a1(mdo): par 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyend pa mtha' yas dang // spobs pa dag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu' chen brnyed par dka' ba la// nyam rgyab dag gis mnyes pa
352a2(mdo): bgyid myi nus// sangs rgyas gnas nas 'gro kun phan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang // 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gis 'byub pa dang // snang du
352a3(mdo): nges 'bya ba rnam par stsal pa dang // dbang bskur ye shes so sor zhu bar 'chal// theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khod chud cing // mtha' yas rgya me'i 'khor lhags dang // ga/ dag rgya cheran pos don gnyer po dag/ 
352a4(mdo): de dag phan srad sangs rgyas la yang zhu// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu char bcad cing // sangs rgyas bstand pa 'di ni shin tu bzung // bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzad// lus can rnams la bshad
352a5(mdo): pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyend pa mtha' yas pas// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bro mya chud// bde lag/ shegs mkhyend pa shes pas myi dpogs pas// mkhas pa
352a6(mdo): yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen 'dug du// ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang // chos kyi dbang phyag rgyal po rab rlangs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bzang
352a7(mdo): gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal thos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di bskrad ces gsolang te//
