352a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tsheng ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su myi skyo bar chos ston/ 
352b1(mdo): pa lags par rig cing de bzhin gshegs ni sems can thams cad myi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas// don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang / 
352b2(mdo): lags// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis rgyan na// byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa 'apyod pa na mdzes pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snang ba bsam
352b3(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa mthong nas// gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing / the tsom mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po shind tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
352b4(mdo): can myi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa mtsho dag dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong zhing / gnas pa rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
352b5(mdo): sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags// bcom ldan
352b6(mdo): senas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyi mnol pa btsal zhing ga com da rnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sum la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yul la mngon tu 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / 
352b7(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par gyur da pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi byed pa dag yongs su 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par spyong par 'gyur ba dang / bdud
352b8(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor char gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa yang dag par 'dzind par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas khro shand tu na
353a1(mdo): rnam nges pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas/ mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
353a2(mdo): chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bkal stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chad myed pa rnam par gdon myi za
353a3(mdo): bar thob nas// khyod bro rnam par gdon myi za ba 'di lta bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems dpal ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de ci'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs
353a4(mdo): par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan chad myed pa gzhan dag kyang yong su rdzogs par
353a5(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba/ ras khyod la bshang ngo // byang chub sems dpa la gzungs kyi dbang gyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes
353a6(mdo): gso yad te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dri skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste rgyas
353a7(mdo): khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyar te/ rigs kyi bu byang chul sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi pa 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa
353a8(mdo): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gcig ko gcig gab zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la gnod par myi byed pa ste/ byang chub
353b1(mdo): sems dpal zhe sda kyi sems myed pa ni/ sems can thams cad yid du 'ong zhing dka' ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rkyen gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
353b2(mdo): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tan ni gnyis po 'di dag ge/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta stes/ ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad pa dang / bdel 'gro sgo byed pa sre/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
353b3(mdo): kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsu po 'di dag go// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
353b4(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal khrims kyi rkyen ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor da pa dang / ka nga smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang / 
353b5(mdo): gang bcom pa de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'did/ ga go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul
353b6(mdo): khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind sgyu myed pa yin// shes rab sgyu myed pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu myed pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu myed pa yin// yongs su mye ngas 'das pa chen po bran
353b7(mdo): myed pa yang sgyu myed pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ko/ drug gang zhe na 'di lte ste/ yid la bcags pa byed pa'i rgyal khris
353b8(mdo): kyi phyir skyon myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir/ nyes pa myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren pa ma yin pa'i rgyal khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang dka' ba'i chos shind tu na pa
354a1(mdo): phyir mthun ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis/ 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir/ rang dga'i tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pas// rang kyis dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims de
354a2(mdo): drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rkyen ni bdun po 'di dag ko// bdun ka zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa
354a3(mdo): dag pa dang / brtson 'grus na par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab na par dag pa dang / thab pa rnam par dag pa dang / bka yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi
354a4(mdo): byang chub ses dpal rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag dgo brkyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste// spobs pa phun su 'tshogs pa dang / das phun su 'tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba myed pa phun su 'tshogs
354a5(mdo): pa dang / lhod pa myed pa phun su 'tshogs pa dang / khon tu 'dzin/ pa myed pa phun gsum 'tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung bamanyes par byed pa yun gsum 'tshogs pa dang / ral pa yun gsum
354a6(mdo): 'tshogs pa dang / dge' ba'i bzhes gnyen mgul bar byed pa phun su 'tshogs pa ste/ brkyang po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni chu bo 'di dag go// dgug zhen/ 
354a7(mdo): 'di lta ste// 'jigs pa myed pa yin/ skrag pa myed pa yin/ bas pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cad she pa yin/ zhi ba'i sa rjes
354a8(mdo): su thob pa yin te dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rkyeni bcu po 'di dag go// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi
354b1(mdo): dang / ji skad smos pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gyi rkyen dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang // smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gyi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir/ sems can
354b2(mdo): yongasu smyin par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad myi byed pa'i phyir/ skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyong ba la rjes su slob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i myod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal myed pa'i
354b3(mdo): phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge' bi la rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas myi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang myi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
354b4(mdo): rgyan te// rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa kyi tshul khrims kyi rkyen no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyan gang zhe na// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs
354b5(mdo): dpal rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyan ni gcig go// gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khyams pa ste/ 'did/ ga ni gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge
354b6(mdo): 'dzind kyi rgyan ni/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ gnyis ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang mnyen pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi rgyan ni gsuM po 'di dag go// gsuM gang zhe na 'di lta
354b7(mdo): ste/ sgyu myed pa dang / g.yo myed pa dang / bcos pa myed pa ste/ gsu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rkyen ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas
354b8(mdo): 'gro ba ma yin par myi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gyis 'gro ba ma yin par myi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gyis 'gro ba ma yin par myi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par myi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag
355a1(mdo): A go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// sdug pazhin 'di lta ste/ bslab pa lnga song ba'o// lnga gang zhe na 'dod par bya ba la 'dod pa dang / 
355a2(mdo): gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / brI tso ste sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spang ba'o// rigs kyi pu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag go// 
355a3(mdo): drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge la 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lho rjes su
355a4(mdo): dran pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go// dud gang zhe na 'di lta ste// byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa'i byad
355a5(mdo): chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa steng / dran pa yang dag byang/ chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag bya dza/ chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan
355a6(mdo): lag dang / shind tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lte/ bdun po 'di dag go// 
355a7(mdo): rigs kyi zhu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhen 'di lta ste/ 6/ 'phags pa 'i lam yan laka brgyad po bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa lta ba dang / 
355a8(mdo): ya bdag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mthal dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsom wa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / ya bdag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
355b1(mdo): brkyad po 'di dag no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ti nge 'dzind kyi rgyan ni dgul po 'di dag go// dgu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa myed pa'i sems kyi
355b2(mdo): snying rje chen po 'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongasu myi gtang bar gnas nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben par/ sdig pa myi dgel ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rnaM bar rtog pa dang bcas pa
355b3(mdo): rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang bde la ba can bsam rten dang po rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so den par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi ste/ nang shin tu rang zhing seMs kyi rgyu
355b4(mdo): gcig tu mya rang pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing rnam par dpyod pa dmyed pa/ ting pe 'dzind las skyes bu dgal ba dang bdel pa can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso de dag la ba'i 'dod chags dang bral
355b5(mdo): te btang snyoms can tu gnas la dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin gyis bdel ba la lus kyi tshor te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyis btang / snyoms can dran pa can dang ldan zhing bdel bar gnas pa'o// zhes
355b6(mdo): brjod pa dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de bde ba yang sangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs te/ yid bde'i po dang / yid myi bdel ba snga nas nub pas/ bdel ba yang myed sdug bsngas
355b7(mdo): yang myed de/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas te/ de rnam pa thams cad gzugs kyi 'du shes las shin tu 'das te/ thogs pa yi 'du shes rnams nub nas/ sku
355b8(mdo): tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mo shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' ma thal yas skye mched las shi nad tu 'das te/ 
356a1(mdo): nam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nas shes mthal las skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// / dernam pa thams cad dran pa zhes mtha' yas skye mched las gnad tu 'das te/ ci yang byed do/ 
356a2(mdo): snyam nas ci yang myed pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du mi yang myed pa'i skye mched las shi nad tu 'das te// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas
356a3(mdo): so// de rnam pa thams cad tu 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las shind tu 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha
356a4(mdo): mngon sum cu 'ang myi byed la/ sngon gyi byin rlabs kyis yang langs nas da/ sems can rnams kyang yongasu sbyin par byed pa ste/ ting nge/ 'dzind kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs
356a5(mdo): napa rnams kyi nyi nge 'dzid kyi kun ni 'argya bo 'dings so// 'argyasazhen 'di sa'i kyi 'byugs des la rnasems dpa' dang / ne gnas so su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson par
356a6(mdo): 'dod pa dang / nang du yang dag jog sbed pa dang dgel ba'i rtsa ba rnams chung myi zab dang / sems dben pa/ dang lu sa shind tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems zhing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems
356a7(mdo): la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ses dpal rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi shes
356a8(mdo): rab kyi rgyan ni gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig go// gcig gang zhen 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la the tsom myed pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs
356b1(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen ni gnyis po 'di dag go// gnyis gang zhe na 'di lte ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang
356b2(mdo): chub sems dpal rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'ang dag go// gsum gang zhen 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo ralde sbubs nges par gcod pa dang / mun yun dag lel
356b3(mdo): bste gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhen 'di la ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes
356b4(mdo): pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba spong ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon dag su du bya ba'i 'od dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal nas
356b5(mdo): kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga ga zhe na 'di lta ste/ dmyigs pa myed pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab mchog gi bsam gtan pa yin pas/ ting
356b6(mdo): nge 'dzind kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / drug gsum mnyam pa nyid paso rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yong su dag pa ste/ 
356b7(mdo): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
356b8(mdo): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid bladag gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rmyi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / 
357a1(mdo): nadrag mnyam pa nyid pas/ sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba byed pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni
357a2(mdo): gzugs rnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha lta bu'i shes pas rang gyi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag
357a3(mdo): pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni nyes par spras pa'i tshig rnams la 'khor khro ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / bstod pa dang bsngags pa dang / rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nyid la ga
357a4(mdo): gcod pa dag la chos kyi skul rab tu rtog pa yongs dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'a'akhor ba rmyi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su myi skyo ba yongs su dag pa/ 
357a5(mdo): rang / rdo rje lu bu'i bsam pas brtan po yongs su dag pa dang / ma mam thams cad las grol bas zang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed ba yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'i bas/ 
357a6(mdo): gtan gyi pha rolar tu phyirang pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par zhen pa myed pas/ lhag mthong yong su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bskyed pas dmyigs pa yong su dag / 
357a7(mdo): pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ ni/ sems can yong su sbyin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas/ gzungs yongs/ 
357a8(mdo): su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rgyan kyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go// bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
357b1(mdo): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa byed cing / yid la byed pa myed pa dang yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba dang / 'gag pa myed par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang / sems dben pa dang / 
357b2(mdo): dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang lam rnams la 'ong ba myed pa
357b3(mdo): dang/ 'gro ba byed pa shes pa ste/ dngos po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab tu ni brkyang po 'di dag go// brkyang gang zhen 'dis ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / 
357b4(mdo): rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang / chos kyi phung po rje su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / da mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong dang mnyam pa
357b5(mdo): 'i nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag myed pa'i phyir rten cing 'o/ la bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / myi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas chos
357b6(mdo): thas cad nges par rtogs pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brkyang po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go/ nadaku gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sngon/ 
357b7(mdo): gi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyi mthi' dag pa ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas// da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgya chud myi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang rkyen nye bar bsgrub pas/ 
357b8(mdo): ma nges pa rnams zhes pa dang / yongs su sbyin par byed pas// log pa nyid du nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnye pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
358a1(mdo): pa'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos ra' du phye ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dbul
358a2(mdo): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ko// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma la bur shes pa dang / yongs su btags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir mi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'a
358a3(mdo): ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smyig rgya lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du sa phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor yang bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag cha
358a4(mdo): lta bur shes pa dang chos kyi dbyings 'dren pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa/ dang de bzhin nyid gnas myed pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' myi 'khrugs pa mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas dag 'dus
358a5(mdo): ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang la rnams kyi shes ba kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs/ 
358a6(mdo): kyi byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi gzungs kyi rkyen ni gcig go// gcig gang zhe na/ dran pa brjed pang ngas lag/ rigs kyi bu byang chub byang chub sems dpa' nas kyi rkyen ni gnyis po 'di dag go// gnyis gang zhe na 'di sa rtse/ 
358a7(mdo): kun tu 'dzin pa dang 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsu bo 'di dag go// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'phru la mkhas pa/ 
358a8(mdo): dang / nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsuM po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste// chags pa myed pa'i tshig dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa'i cha
358b1(mdo): dang / rab tu grol ba'i ba'i tshig dang brdzun pa skyed pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'angadi dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal nas kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zos pa thams cad kyi ninganan
358b2(mdo): don la rtog pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi dang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra tham pa cad las chos nyid la nyon pa dang / 'jig rten sa
358b3(mdo): cang las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad sbas pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / 
358b4(mdo): dbyed pa'i sa su mthun pa 'ong ga rab tum sa pa dang / dmyal byed sa gzung bar 'os pa 'ingag dang gso byed pas thang bar thos pa'i tshig dang / snying che chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos smon pa dang / srod
358b5(mdo): gangs pas kyang ba chos smon pa dang / 'jig rten zhes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub me nyams dpal rnams kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go// btsun gang zhe
358b6(mdo): na 'di lta ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi sobs pa dang / mya rang pa'i spobs pa dang / chags pa byed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyan cing byed pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa byed pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu
358b7(mdo): nges pa'i tshig gis spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rkyen ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa dang
358b8(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi skang shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin kyi sang shes pa dang / nam mkhral lding gyi sa de shes pa dang / myi 'am ci'i gang shes pa dang / lto phyi chen po'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can
359a1(mdo): cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brkyang po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// dgu gang zhe na 'di la sde/ 'khor gyi nang du sa gong ba byed pa dang / su bani
359a2(mdo): nang du zhum pa myed pa dang / chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa myed pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la spel zhing bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la
359a3(mdo): rjes su 'thun pa dang bstan pa shes pa dang // khyengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje stond pa dang / mngon par chags par byed pa rnams la sreg pa'i skal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smyin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
359a4(mdo): tu ston pa ste/ shu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems pa da' nas kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag go// bcu ga pa zhen/ di lci ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tso myed par ston pa shes pa dang / 
359a5(mdo): blos chos skye ba'i sgo dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la rag ma la pa dang / yi ge bas nad pa myi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyan pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag
359a6(mdo): pa rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu myed par brjod pa dang / rnam par sbyang ba'i bsngags pa chang byed pa stond pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol ba 'jug pa chags pa byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis ga
359a7(mdo): ba'i so so yang dag pa rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstand pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag/ 
359a8(mdo): gsungs so// // gang gis theg mchog depa 'di mdzes pa/ blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi sde/ rgyal khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ shin tu na nges ron dang de bzhin gzungs// de ni lus can kun/ 
359b1(mdo): gi yid 'ong dga'// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing // de'i rnam pa ltung ba kun chad pa// 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no// lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa ste// de'i smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub// 
359b2(mdo): nan tan snying por byed pa dang ldan// 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rkyen yin no// de'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te// shes rab ni mang 'grol zi ye shes mthong // de'i mya ngan 'das pa sgyum sbyin// 'di ni tshul khrims na par dag
359b3(mdo): pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims skyon myed tshul khrims ne bar dag/ tshul khrims bun chags ma yin 'dran ma byed// de'i rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims kyis ni
359b4(mdo): sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dedag/ bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag// thabs dang de/ de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba myed cing brtan la shi nad tu kaR+sha
359b5(mdo): sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor khro phyeng // lhod pa spangs shing dag sra g.yo yang sra// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rkyen/ brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa s+ye/ de'i sems
359b6(mdo): ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur// de la yid la gcags par 'gyur myed de// 'di rig padag tshul khrims dag pa'i rkyen// 'jigs pa myed cing myi skrag mi zhum ste// bsam pa nges zhing zhi la yid rab zhi// 'dir ni de'i brnam
359b7(mdo): palhod par gyur // 'di ni gang dag tshul khris dag pa'i rgyan// grags ches sems ni las su rung ba yin// de ni rtul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid// 'dir ni rang lus mtshan gis rgyan byed pa// 'di ni gang dag tshul khris
359b8(mdo): dag pa'i rkyen// de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// de ni nyon mongs myed pas rtag sems rgyan// 'di ni gangabadag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyam// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni/ 
360a1(mdo): legs par rgyan// theg pa mchog la sems can yongs sbyin byed// gang phyir sdig pa thams cad myi byed pas// rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan par byed// byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing // byang chub snying po
360a2(mdo): de pa brgyan par byed// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag brgyan byed cing // nga rgyal myed pas shes pa legs par rgyan// de ni byams pas seMs can kun khyab ste// mkhas pa rtag tu dran dang mnyen pa yin// g.yo ba myed cing sgyu myed
360a3(mdo): bcos myed // gti muka 'dod dang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin// de ni sgrib pa lnga po na par sel// bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug skom// byang chub yan lag brgyan dang lam sgom ste// mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin
360a4(mdo): bsam gtan byed// rnal 'byor da pa ni zhi gnas nges sems sbyong // de nas tshul bzhin dgel ba chud myi gzon// dben dang shin tu sadang so sor rtog/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sbyar ba yin// chos
360a5(mdo): nams la ni the tsom myed par gyur// de la kun das ldang dang 'gyur dwa myed// de la ma rig gti mug mun pa byed// dben pa snang ni yongasu shes pa shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmyigs pa byed pa ste/ 
360a6(mdo): shes rab dam pa bsas gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag/ lag pa'i dargyal byed cing shes pa dag/ bcus gsum dag la ye shes mi chags// 'dod chags thal ba'i shes pas chom
360a7(mdo): kyang dag dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems myed// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyad gyur te// myi lam skye mtshol ba myed pa'i phyir// bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams// 
360a8(mdo): 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spongs// shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur dartse// gzugs brtan snyam thag sa 'dra ba'i phyir// yus dab ga rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsu po dag de nin par stso/ 
360b1(mdo): shes rab kyis ni brjod pa brgyan kya rang te// mkhas dang mthol ba ma yin dpal bar 'gyur byin dpa// dam pa'i chos sku rtag/ turab rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spyod // shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan
360b2(mdo): gyurd to// skyo ba myed cing bsam pa brtan pa dang // de ni blar ba myed cing dor myed pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur da te// de la ma chags gyur da dang lhag mthong dang // 
360b3(mdo): mkhas pa mngon par shes pa skyed pa dang / 'khor gsu po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de// shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // seMs
360b4(mdo): can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams skyeng // dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran gyi 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis myed de// rdzu 'phrul gi/ da ni lus dang sems kyang dben// sems can gis ni dbang po kun myi shes
360b5(mdo): bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil myi non// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs// de bzhin lam la 'od myed 'gro ba myed// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes// 
360b6(mdo): de'i lhag mthong bapyod yul mtha' yas te// chos kyi phung po ji bzhin phung po shes// khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes// des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes// rten pas bsags pas chos rnams bdag myed de/ 
360b7(mdo): don dam bden par 'khrug pa myed par shes// tshul bzhin gyis ni nges pa rtog pa shes// dus gsum la ni chags myed ye shes 'jug/ rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes// dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig/ 
360b8(mdo): tu shes// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// na sgrub mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes// yongs btags rtsa ba rmyi lam ji bzhin no// nam 'khrul mtshan nyid smyig rgyu 'dra ba ste// 'pho myed chos nas gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid
361a1(mdo): bcu phrod bya ba phyig yong lta bu ste/ rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ma ci bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tum 'dres shes// de bzhin nyid ni gnas myed de rab shes// yang dag mam lani rtag tu mi g.yo chos// su
361a2(mdo): ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su myed// shes rab zab cing bro ni rab yangs pa// brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed// de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa myed// chos rnams kun tu 'dzind cing 'dzind par byed// 
361a3(mdo): don dang tshig 'brul ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong rgyang // chags myed tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu 'grol ba'i tshig dang rdzun myed tshig/ thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas
361a4(mdo): pa de ni ye shes rton par byed// nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes / gang zag myed pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// de ni gzungs kyi brgyan par gyurd pa yin// 
361a5(mdo): de'i tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su 'thun// gzung bar 'ong dang dus su 'os pa yin// de'i chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod// blad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ de'i spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste/ 
361a6(mdo): shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags// rgyan can mye dang 'khrul myed nges pa'i tshig/ nges par brgyas pa yi 'phreng bas legs brgyad bzhin// lha dang klu'i skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lta ma yin// 
361a7(mdo): mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nas spa gong myed pa ste// spras pa mthong nas zhum par 'gyur ba myed// 'jigs pa myed par chos kyi gtam yang brjed
361a8(mdo): 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung ba tu shes// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snrel zhi yi// gtam brjod rnal 'byor de mthong nas rjes su 'thun// nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston// yul mngon tshogs la sreg pa'i skal pa ste/ 
361b1(mdo): theg pa gsu gi rim pa'i gtam yang brjod// dogs pa kun gyi the tsom gcod pa ste// blo'i chos rnams mngon gsum 'gyur ba yin// de'i shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad myi shes// don rnas
361b2(mdo): nges pa dag la rgyun cad myed// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// de ni gzungs kyi rgyan par gyur da pa yin// kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes// rnam par byang ba'i phan yon zug pa myed// de bzhin
361b3(mdo): sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste// de ni yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang // bskal par rgyun cad myed par rab brjod kyang // yon
361b4(mdo): tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so// // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal lo/ del bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu sdang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur/ 
361b5(mdo): nas// byang chub sems dpa'i mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing // byangabyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gyod par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// bad+mad
361b6(mdo): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang shes pa'i snang ba dang / ka' mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / bskyab pa'i spang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
361b7(mdo): sems dpa' nas kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nas kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad
361b8(mdo): gang zhe na 'di lta ste// sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa la sogs pa dang / zos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnams ragadod myi za rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gi/ 
362a1(mdo): mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spong zhing / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po// phun su tshogs par gyurang pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas// sangs rgyas
362a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das nas kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'dzeg pa dang / dran pa sngon 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs
362a3(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brkyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ don gi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes kyi blo gros yon ka rnaM par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin
362a4(mdo): pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gi// nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa/ dang / rigs pa'i blo gros yin go// 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin/ pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin gyi// nyan thos dang rang
362a5(mdo): sangs rgyas rgya blo grom ma yin pa dang / brlabs po si'i the gros yid kyi chung ngu'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gi/ dung kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen zol blo gros yin gi/ seMs
362a6(mdo): can rna par 'che ba'i blo gros ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi sdang ba ni brkyang po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snapa pa ni brgyad po 'di dgo// brgyad gang
362a7(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par kho nga du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa nas rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so la/ 
362a8(mdo): dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur yang / snrel zhi rgyung bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spre'u tshugs
362b1(mdo): rgyang bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chung bar 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtog pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang
362b2(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brkyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / tha rad pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis
362b3(mdo): stond pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa myed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang srid pa dang ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi spang ba'i phyir zag pa myed pa'i chos kyi snang ba
362b4(mdo): dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi skyon myed pa'i mngon gsum du byed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi snang ba dang / bro bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shi tu rtog pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mong ras kyi sdang ba dang / sems rang
362b5(mdo): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi chos kyi
362b6(mdo): snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes po'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brkyang gang zhen 'di lta ste/ brkyad pa'i shes pa'i sdang ba dang / rgyan tu zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / 
362b7(mdo): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes bI snang ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgral bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag
362b8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyend pa'i snang ba ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brkyang po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i sdang ba ni brkyang po 'di dag
363a1(mdo): go// brgyad ga zhen 'di lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gi skyon byed par 'tshujug pa de la de'i sA pa ga dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i ldang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa/ 
363a2(mdo): gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom la gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa 'thob pas 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/ 
363a3(mdo): de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgos pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thog par de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gong gis byang chub sems drapa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bdenapa
363a4(mdo): bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'cha rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems// dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi
363a5(mdo): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad lo 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lha'i myig gis ge thugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir rang gsal ba'i snang ba dang / 
363a6(mdo): lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / sngon gi gnas bskal pa grangs myed pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gis 'o// 
363a7(mdo): gsal ba'i snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa myed pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa myed pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang ba dang / sems can/ 
363a8(mdo): thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad dgongs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang po ni brgyad
363b1(mdo): po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go// dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bskyab pas ye shes kyi spang ba dang / sgrub pas shes rab kyi spa ba dang / sgrub pas bro'i snang 'a dang
363b2(mdo): sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas 'khrugs pa myed par sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas shin tu mthor thug pa'i snang ba
363b3(mdo): ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// // dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pas na// sngon chad las dge bsag
363b4(mdo): pa chung myi gzon// phra bar sngo ba phun su tshogs pa de// phyir myir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed// zos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed pa myed // rnam par gdon myi za bar myur du thob// nye bar zhi bas yul rnams
363b5(mdo): las ni sbas// dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral// dran pa rgya bon shin tu bas kA// bya ba bya ba dag ni rnam par byed// dran pa dang / dang ldan par rig nas ni// rgyal ba rang byung dag gis byin gyis rlob
363b6(mdo): dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa// de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus// shes rab ldan pa mun pa na bral te// lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed// blo gros snang ba bzang ldan thob gyur nas// dgongs pa dang ni the tsom rnams
363b7(mdo): kyang gcod// dran dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis// byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed// de ni don gyi blo gros can yin gyi// tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug sbal 'ang myin// sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can// namar
363b8(mdo): shes pa'i blo ni 'dod ma yin// chos kyi blo gros ldan par 'gyurar pa de// nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa// de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed// de ni sangs rgyas
364a1(mdo): 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan// nyan thos 'gyur myin rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin// rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros cen yin gi// de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi// bdud kyi/ 
364a2(mdo): blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin/ blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi// sems can gang la'ing rnam par 'che ba myin// chos 'ga' bstan pa gang gis de la ni// the tsom myed cing rtogs par khong du chud // de ni dgod
364a3(mdo): te gsungs la mkhas 'gyur zhing // sems can spyod pa nas la rtogs dang ldan// so so yang dag ri dag la rtogs ldan zhing // de'i shes pa 'jug pa chag pa myed// rkyen byang bye ba po dang nam brel bar// rten pa'i chos nas
364a4(mdo): dag ni rab tu shes// de ni snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas gyurd cing // spyi'u chu dgas tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ji snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong tu chud// 'jig
364a5(mdo): rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba yis// lha myi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba gis/ rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis// shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin// kha na ma tor bcas dang mazo byed// ye shes rab
364a6(mdo): tugasal ba chen po 'jug/ lam ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston to// zag par bcas dang zag pa myed pa'i// chos la de'i snang ba rab tu 'jug/ de ni zag pa
364a7(mdo): thams cad spong byed cing // lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la// de'i zhes pa rtag tu rab tu 'jug/ de ni de'is dri bral ba rib myed// skyon myed thob nas spyad pa rnams
364a8(mdo): dkyang gyod// rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs la// de'i sa sgrib pa myed pa nas/ rang bzhin gis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa'i byam yang shes// ji ltar mya ngan las 'das par gyur
364b1(mdo): pa ni// skyo ba myed cing 'byung ba myed par shes// 'di 'dra 'di ni theg pa chen po la// chos kyi sdang ba mtha' yas gyur da pa yin// de ni brgyad pa'i ni shes pa dang // rgyun tu zhugs la shes la 'jug pa dang / ldan cig
364b2(mdo): phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa dang // phyir myi 'ong lnga/ 'jug pa dang // de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang // 'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag/ kun la de yi shes dang sgrub pa rnams// lhag ma lus myed par
364b3(mdo): rabya tu 'jug sra/ gang gis 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang // 'khrugs myed don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba// de la rab bsgoms smra ba dpal bo rnams 'den pa'i snab ba dag dang ldan pa yin// bden pa dag na
364b4(mdo): bsgom pa byas pas na// skyon myed 'jug dang 'bras bu dang 'othob// gnyi sa dang gsuM dang de bzhin bzhi pa dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras// bu thob par 'gyur// bsgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i stag/ 
364b5(mdo): de dag bzod pa dag ni thob 'gyur dang // gang gis rgyal ba byang chub chab rgya ba de dag la ni spyad par 'gyur// lha'i myig gis su ni de yis kyang // gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong // lha'i rna ba
364b6(mdo): nges par rtogs pa mas pabadag gis gnam sa cags par gyur/ na ga kun pashes gas pa sa ca nings su // 'odagapa sa 'jishes pa sa snang sa yis/ gzhanan bas da parnas
364b7(mdo): la mkhas// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni shes pa'i snang ba yis// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni khrag khrig rnams su 'gro// zag pa myed pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin// bsod nams kyi ni snang ba
364b8(mdo): mtha' yas pa'i// mngon shes thob pa 'gro ba nye bar 'tsho// de yi shes pa chags pa myed pa yis// 'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni gcod par byed// nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor da pa// dran pa dang blo gros rtogs
365a1(mdo): dang chos shes snang // bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te// mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin pa// sgrub pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang // rgya chen blo dang spobs pa mtha' yas dang // yang dag
365a2(mdo): dang ni lhag mthong dang // shin tu 'khrug pa myed par mthar thug gyu rang // spang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa brgyad// 'di dag mtha chen ga la yod pa ni// re shig byang chub thob par ma gyu rad kyang // de ni sangs rgyas jed
365a3(mdo): pa byed par 'gyur// // bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug gis/ sems can rnams la
365a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// bcu drug gang zhe na/ rig ngas kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ kye ma sems ca/ 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa lta ba sna tshogs dang
365a5(mdo): 'dres pa dag ste/ lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bste/ na par bya'o snyam du sems can nas la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin
365a6(mdo): pa'i phyin ci log tu gyurard nas/ myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes// bdag myed pa la bdag tu 'du shes// myi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/ de dag gi phyin ci log thams cad spang
365a7(mdo): ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di ni ngar 'dzind pa dang / nga'i ra 'dzind pa gnas pa dngos por 'du shes pa dag ste/ de dag gi dar
365a8(mdo): 'dzind pa dang nga'i ra 'dzind pa sang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam tu sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgri te 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa khong khro ba ma
365b1(mdo): batshugs pa dang / gnyid la chags pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/ zab mo chos rnams la nye ba ma thob pa dag ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam
365b2(mdo): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni skye mched drug gis chags ste/ myig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas// mtshan mar 'dzind cing mngon rtag su 'dzin
365b3(mdo): pa 'dzin// rna bas sgra zos snas dri bsnams/ lces ro myangs/ lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg// yid kyis chos rnams rna par shes nas// mtshan mar 'dzind cing mngon rtags su 'dzind pa dag yin te// de dag
365b4(mdo): gi skye mched drug gis chags pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstand par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / 
365b5(mdo): nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad ces pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas/ chung ngu dag pas/ bdag che'o snyam du bdag la
365b6(mdo): rlom sems su byed pa mtshungs pa dag pas ni che/ che ba dag pas kyang che bdag ches che'o ste du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa// gzugs la bad ga tu khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len
365b7(mdo): pa/ ma thob par bdag la thob pa ste du shes pa bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems dpa'/ log pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/ de dag gi nga rgyal rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstand par bya'o snyam du
365b8(mdo): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye ba dang de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/ de dag gi lam ngan pa spang / 'phags
366a1(mdo): pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam tu sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kyem sems can 'di dag ni chung sa dang / bu dang / mu
366a2(mdo): mo la yongasu zhen pa yis/ sred pa'i khol khor gyu rang nas/ rang dga' myed par dbang myed pa dag ste/ de dag gang gis 'dod par 'gro bar rang dkar dbang yod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam tu sems
366a3(mdo): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ phan tshun myi mthun pa 'khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang gnod sems yang ba dag ste/ de dag gi khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod ses
366a4(mdo): spang pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o ste ru sems can rnams la byas nga chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdig pa'i grogs thos yongs su dzind cing / dge ba'i bzhes
366a5(mdo): gnyen dang bral nas/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dag pa ste/ de dgadagel ba'i bshin gnyen gyis yongs su zin par byed pa/ sdig pa 'i las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ chos bstand par bya'o snyam du seMs
366a6(mdo): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems cad 'di ni bkas pa chags pa'i grol gyis nod pa// ngoms kyi myong ba/ 'phags pa'i zhes rab dang bral ba dag ste/ de dag gi chags
366a7(mdo): pa spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab skyed pa'i phyir/ chos bstand par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las mthong ba chad pa
366a8(mdo): dang rtag pa la gnas pa dag ste/ de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i las kyi bya ba la gzud ba'i phyir/ ches bstan par bya'o ste du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye
366b1(mdo): ma sems can 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang gti mug gis long bar gyu ra pa// bdag dang sems can dang sreg dang gsol ba dang / gang zag tu mngon par zhen pa dag ste/ de dag gi 'phaklas pa'i shes rats+yai kyi myi nam par dag pa'i
366b2(mdo): bya ba dang / lta bar gyu rad pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstand par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba/ phung po
366b3(mdo): lnga'i gshed mas zin pa dag ste/ de dag thams cad khams gsum thams cad nas/ 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstand par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma ses
366b4(mdo): can 'di dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/ g.yo ba da dang snyems pas kun tu bkris pa dag ste/ de dag gi g.yo ba dang snyems dpe spang ba'i phyir chos bstand par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang
366b5(mdo): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di ga ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad cing / ngan 'gro'i sgo phyed pa ngag ste/ de dag la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'bye ba dang / ngan 'gro'i
366b6(mdo): cod pa'i phyir/ chos bstand par bya'o ste tu sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drag po 'di dag gis/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
366b7(mdo): skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma 'dres pa sgyum bcu rtsa gnyis ste/ de dag la brtson na byang chub sems dpa' legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no// sum bcu rtsa gnyis
366b8(mdo): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang / bdag shes rab kyis sad par mthong nas/ shes rab kyi sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yi las
367a1(mdo): 'dren pa dang po'o// sems nan dag chung ngu la mos pa dang / bdag chen po la mos pa mthong nas d+d+ha/ theg pa che nu bo la sems can rnams yang dge par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag chos sa/ 
367a2(mdo): yin par 'dod pa dang / bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'tshe ba yongasu ma dag pa dang / dag 'a ba yongs su dag parje mthong sa
367a3(mdo): nas/ sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag lta bar gyu dad par bying pa dang / bdaste yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs par mthong nas/ sems can+da rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag
367a4(mdo): pa'i lta ba la rab tu dgod pa dang / sems can dag ma rig par kyu rang ni / tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed pa bsags pa/ der mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin
367a5(mdo): yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas/ sems can rnams rig pa 'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid lta byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dngasems can dag log pa'i chos lci gnas pa dang bdeg yang dag
367a6(mdo): ma'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas/ yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub pur bya ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa da / sems can dag lem sden n+der gyur te/ kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldas pa dang / bye dag bdog na
367a7(mdo): thams cad yongs su gtong bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams bdog pa mam cad yongs su gtong // la sbyor ga dang / sems cad dag dang tshul ngan pa can du gyur dwa ti/ sdom pa la kyi gnas pa dang / bdag chumA~M khrims
367a8(mdo): yongs su dag par mthong nasaM/ sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sde m+bu pa la rab tu dgod pa dang taM/ sems can dag gnod sems as zhipa/ ba'i shas che ba dang / ha dag bzod pa'i stoms dngakhyim pA ya? gonas
367b1(mdo): par mthong nas/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / sems can dag e lo can du gyu ra da te/ brtson 'grus chung po dang / bdag
367b2(mdo): myed cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas/ sems can rnams brtson 'grus bcom pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag sems g.yeng shing / dran pa nyams pa dang / bdag mnye bar gzhag ste// bas ma/ 
367b3(mdo): gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas/ sems can rnams sems myi g.yeng ba dran pa dang / shes bzhin la rab tu dgod pa dang // sems can dag 'tshal ba'i shes rab can du gyu rod te/ dman zhing gti/ 
367b4(mdo): mug dang ldan pa dang / bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang / bral bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang / gti muka dang bral ba yang dag par 'dzind/ tu 'jug pa dang
367b5(mdo): sems can dag rigs pa ma yin par lu ba zhing / yang ba'i phyi/ pa brtsams pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / yang dag pa'i las brtsams yang mthong nas// sems can rnams
367b6(mdo): mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa'i sas som pa/ yang dag pa 'dzin sgyu 'jug pa dang / sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu gtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su gtog pa'i spyod sum
367b7(mdo): gyu rang pa dang / bdag nyon mongs pa thams cad las log par mthong nas/ sems can rnams nyon mongs par thams cad spong ba la rab tu dgod pa/ sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcings pa nya shing dmyigs
367b8(mdo): pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang ldan zhing / dmyigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol ba mthong nas/ sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs
368a1(mdo): su shes pa dang / dmyigs pa dang bral ba sbyor ba dang / sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te/ byang pa ma yin pa dang / bdag dul zhing sbas te/ byang bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams dul ba dang
368a2(mdo): sbas pa dang / byang ba la rab tu dgod pa dang / sems can dag byas pa myi bzo zhing / byas pa myi shes te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jom pa dang / bdag byas pa bzo zhing byas pa shes te dge ba'i cha pa bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas/ 
368a3(mdo): sems can rnams byas pa bzol ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / dga' ba'i rtsa ba chud myi zod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang gi du song ba dang / bdag chu bo thams cad las
368a4(mdo): shind tu 'das par mthong nas/ sems can rnams chu bo thams cad las shi nad tu 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dka' blo myi bde zhing 'thun par 'dzind pas ma yin pa dang / bdag dka' blo bde zhing
368a5(mdo): mthun par 'dzind pa mthong ba nas/ sems can rnams dka' blo bde zhing / mthun par 'dzind pa yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang // sems can dag 'phongs ste mang zhing / dam pa ma yin pa la yongs
368a6(mdo): su zhen pa dang / bdag ma 'phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba la gnas par spyod pa dang / sems can dag dbul zhing / 
368a7(mdo): 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang / bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas/ sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu dgod pa dang / sems can dag la rtag tu na zhing
368a8(mdo): khams rnam pa bzhi po'i myuru du gdug pa'i dug gis zin pa dang / bdag nad myed cing bde ba la 'gyur pa myed par mthong nas/ sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzind du 'jig pa de dang / sems
368b1(mdo): can dag myi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu btibs shing / ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang / bdag ye shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas/ sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag khams gsuM
368b2(mdo): la chags pas chags shing / rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug par mthong zhing / bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas par shes nas/ sems can rnams khams gsum yongs su shes pa la
368b3(mdo): mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ dang / sems can dag g.yon phyogs ki lam du zhugs pa g.yas phyogs ki lam dang bral ba/ bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mtho nas/ sems can nas
368b4(mdo): g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag lus dang srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang / bdag lus/ dang srog la myi lta zhing / nges pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas/ 
368b5(mdo): sems can rnams lus dang srog la myi lta ba dang / nyes pa mdza ba la rab tu dkod pa dang / sems can dag sangs rgyas dang // chos dang / dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gau / 
368b6(mdo): rgyun myi gcod par gnas mthong nas/ sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gi rigs rgyun myi gcod pa la 'jud pa dang / sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang / bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par
368b7(mdo): gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag stond pa rin po che dang ring du gnas la shing rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang / bdag rjes su dran pa
368b8(mdo): drug ma btang bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
369a1(mdo): mthong nas/ sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag myi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag myi dge ba
369a2(mdo): chos thams cad spangs shing / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas/ sems can rnams myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba da / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi
369a3(mdo): bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul ba yin/ de dag la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams
369a4(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni tshad myed do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas/ nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par byang
369a5(mdo): ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba yang de snyed do// rigs kyi bu gale ta gang dag ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
369a6(mdo): la rab tu gnas par gyur da kyang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi las gang yin pa de/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / 
369a7(mdo): bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpa' dang / rgyur yang nye bar myi 'gro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyan kyi nyon mongs pa
369a8(mdo): spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gi/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye gnas pa/ yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang / nyan thos / 
369b1(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa pas/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do/ kade ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni phyind ci log dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang
369b2(mdo): rang sangs rgyas thams cad ki las ni nyi tshe dang ldan pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyi nad ci log myed cing chad myed pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan com pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu 'dis sems can can thams cad dang / 
369b3(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing / rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
369b4(mdo): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' se/ rjesu yid rangs nas yang bco ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das citsam tu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyas dang / 
369b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
369b6(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po 'dug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pon ji sam/ nab ni
369b7(mdo): gang lags/ rtags ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas ni gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las ni ji mar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni ji sam/ rnam pa ni gang lags/ 
369b8(mdo): tags ni ga pa lags/ mtshan ma gang lags/ gnas ni lags/ de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa thams cad gzigs pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las rjes mngon gsu du gyur pas/ mngon gsum du
370a1(mdo): bdag cag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi dbang phyug ka rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
370a2(mdo): khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i las 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can rnaMs la sangs rgyas
370a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni skye ba yang myed/ 'jug pa yang myed/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir// de ni bskal pa
370a4(mdo): grangs myed par yongs su sbyang ba byas pas yang dag par skyed pa ste/ drug pa yang myed ldog pa yang myed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni ma btang bar sems can thams cad la
370a5(mdo): gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de ni ci ces tu las yongs su thob par bya bar bslab pa yin pa de cas bya chang byed de tsam du bsum kyis kyi khyab ste/ de tsam tu myi bzung cing de tsam du ring
370a6(mdo): song ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// byang chub ji 'dra ba snying rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang
370a7(mdo): chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba myed pa dang / gnas myed par byang chub thob po// de la rtsa ba ni gang gnas ni gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ni gnas so// / 
370a8(mdo): de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa gnyis kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba myed pa dang / gnas myed par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes
370b1(mdo): bya'o// sems can 'di dag gyis ni cha ba myed pa dang / gnas myed pa'i chos 'di dag khong du chud pas de dag gyis khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po 'jug go// 
370b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o// de la zhi ba ni gang / nye ba zhi ba ni gang zhe na nang ni zhi ba'o// phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig ni bdag dang bdag gis song ste de ni de'i rang bzhin no// na bla nga/ snga
370b3(mdo): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no// myig stong par yongs su shes nas// gzugs rnams la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// rna ba stong par yongs su she
370b4(mdo): nas/ \u0f7fswa rnams la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// swa stob par yongs su shes nas/ dri rnams la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// lce stong par yongs su shes nas/ ro rnams la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir
370b5(mdo): nye bar zhi kha zhes bya'o// lus stong par yongs su shes nas/ reg bya na/ sa la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// yid stong par de yongs su shes nas/ chos rnams la myi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba
370b6(mdo): shes bya'o// sems can 'di dag gyis ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi khong du chud bam de dag gi kho du chud bar bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'dug go// rigs kyi
370b7(mdo): bya sems rang bzhin du 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o// ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ 
370b8(mdo): nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzhol ba// nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/ rang bzhin do ni shin tu 'od gsal ba nyid do// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di
371a1(mdo): khong du chud pas/ tho bur gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis// kun nas nyon mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsol ba de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyamu sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen
371a2(mdo): bo 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa'o// de la blang ba myed pa ni gang / dor ba myed pa gang zhe na/ blang ba myed pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad myi 'dzind pa'o// dor ba myed pa
371a3(mdo): zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad myi 'dor ba'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed par chu bor 'jug pa na ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol myed pa dang / pha rol myed pa ma yin pa yang dag par rjes
371a4(mdo): su mthong ba de ltar rgal to// de ltade bzhin gshegs pas/ chos tha/ mas cad pha rol myed pa dang / pha rol dang bral la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// byis
371a5(mdo): pa so so'i skye bo dag gis ni phreng ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa 'di khong du chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can/ rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ 
371a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub ni mtshan ma myed pa dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'o// de la mtshan ma myed pa ni gang dmyigs pa myed pa ni gang zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa ni mtshan ma myed pa'o// gzugs yang
371a7(mdo): dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa ni mtshan ma myed pa'o// sgra mnyan du myed pa ni dmyigs myed pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'o// 
371a8(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa'o// dri snyam du myed pa ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa ni mtshan ma myed pa'o// ro myang du myed pa ni myigs su myed pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su
371b1(mdo): myed pa ni/ mtshan ma myed pa'o// reg bya reg par byar byed pa ni dmyigs su myed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa ni mtshan ma byed pa'o// chos yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ni dmyigs pa myed pa
371b2(mdo): 'o// de ltar na mtshan ma myed pa dang dbyigs su byed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi pyod yul lo// 'phags pa rnams kyi khyod yul gang zhe na// gang khams gsum pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi ston
371b3(mdo): yul lo// de ltar gang spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa'i spyod yul 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du
371b4(mdo): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin// da ltar 'byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa/ 'khor gsum
371b5(mdo): yongs su dag pa'o// de la 'khor gsu yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems myi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa myi byug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed par myi 'jug pa'o// 
371b6(mdo): de sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa myi gnas pas 'das pa la rtog par myi byed/ ma 'ongs pa la myi sems/ da ltar byang ba spros par myi byed do// de ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag
371b7(mdo): pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// / rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus myed cing 'dus ma byas pa'o// 
371b8(mdo): de la lus myed pa ni gang myig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni
372a1(mdo): gang la skye ba myed pa dang / 'jig pa myed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa ste/ de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang / bral ba'i 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ji ltar bar 'dus byas kyang / de bzhin
372a2(mdo): du khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni myed pa'o// myed pa gang yin pa de la gnyis su myed do// lus myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis
372a3(mdo): kho du ma chud pas de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ces pa de ni dbyer myed pa dang gnas so// de la gnas ni gang dbyer
372a4(mdo): myed pa ni gang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so// tha dad pa ma yin pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so// g.yo ba myed pa ni
372a5(mdo): dbyer myed pa'o// stong pa ni gnas so// dmyigs su myed pa ni dbyer/ myed pa'o// mtshan ma myed pa ni gnas so// rnam par rtog pa myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// smon pa myed pa ni gnas so// smon lam 'debs
372a6(mdo): pa myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// sems can myed pa'o// sems can myed pa nyi da ni gnas so// thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// nam mkha' ni gnas so// dmyigs su myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// skye ba myed pa ni
372a7(mdo): gnaso// 'gog pa myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// 'dus byas ni gnaso// rgyu ba myed pa ni dbyer myed pa'o// byang chub ni gnaso// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer myed pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// mngon par grub pa myed pa ni
372a8(mdo): dbyer myed pa'o// de ltar dbyer myed pa dang / gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu bya
372b1(mdo): chub ni lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar myi rgya'o// sems kyis kyang mi yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni blon po'o sems ni sgyu ma lta'u/ gang lus dpa sems 'di lta bu khong du chud pa de ni tha snyad btags nas/ bya
372b2(mdo): chub ces bya ba'i byang chub ni lus so sems sam/ chos so/ chos ma yin pa'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden pa'am/ brdzun pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
372b3(mdo): chub ni chos thams cad brjod par bya ma yin no// byang chub la ni gang gi tshig tu tha snyad gdags par 'gyur ba'i dbyibs ci yang myed de// ji ltar nas mkha'i dbyings myed cing brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang dbyibs
372b4(mdo): myed cing / brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na tu yongs su 'chal na/ chos thams cad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ chos la tshig myed do// tshig la yang chos myed do// chos kyi tshul kyi
372b5(mdo): rna ba 'di sems can rnams kyi khong du chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni bzung du myed
372b6(mdo): pa dang / gzhi myed pa'o// de la bzung du myed pa ni gang / gzhi myed pa ni gang zhe na/ myig yongs su shes pa ni bzung du myed pa'o// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi myed pa'o// rna ba yongs su shes pa ni gzung du myed
372b7(mdo): pa'o// sgra dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi' myed pa'o// sna yongs su shes pa ni gzung du myed pa'o// dri dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi' myed pa'o// lce yongs su shes pa ni gzung du myed pa'o// ro dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi' myed pa'o// 
372b8(mdo): lus yongs su shes pa ni gzung du myed pa'o// reg bya dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi'i myed pa'o// yid yongs su shes pa ni gzung du myed pa'o// chos dmyigs su myed pa ni gzhi'i myed pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ bya
373a1(mdo): chub gzung du myed pa dang / gzhi'i myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang byig gzung du myed gzugs gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas myed do// na pa
373a2(mdo): gzung du myed gzhi'i ma yin rnam par shes pa gnas myed do// sna gzung du myed dri gzhi' ma yin rnam par shes pa gnas myed do// lce gzung du/ myed ro gzhi'am yin rnam par shes la gnas myed do// lus gzung du myed reg bya gzhi
373a3(mdo): ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas myed do// yid gzung du myed chos gzhi'i ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de rnam par shes pa gnas myed pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas rnams rab tu shes
373a4(mdo): so// sems can de dag gis sems kyi gnas gang zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni/ gzhi bo 'di go// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas dang / 
373a5(mdo): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dag/ sems can rnams kyi seMm kyi gnas te// sems kyi gnas de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnas myed par mkhyen to// gnas myed pa'i man 'di sems
373a6(mdo): can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so/ 
373a7(mdo): stong pa nyid gang gis/ byang chub stong pa 'i stong pa nyid des/ chos thams cad stong ngo // stong pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin tu/ chos de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ stong pa nyid kyis stong
373a8(mdo): pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin no// de ni 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang // byang chub ces bya ba tshul gcig par shes pa ste/ de la gnyis gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub gnyis su dbye' pa gnyis chung zad kyang
373b1(mdo): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thas cad ni gnyis su myed pa gnyis su 'byod myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa mying myed mtshan de ma myed pa/ rgyu ba myed pa rab tu rgyu ba myed pa/ kun tu 'byung ba myed pa'o// gang stong pa nye
373b2(mdo): bya ba de ni mngon par zhen pa myed cing / 'dzind pa myed pa'i tshig tha dgas so// 'di la don dam par gang stong pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed kyang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do// ji ltar nam mkha' la zhem
373b3(mdo): mkha' zhes kyang brjod/ nam mkha' brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/ stong pa la stong pa zhes brjod kyang stong pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ mying myed pa la mying du tha snyad gdogs pa de ni/ chos thams
373b4(mdo): 'jug pa'o// mying de yang yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gan zhes pa ma yin no// ji ltar mying yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin du mying gang gis chos brjod pa'i chos de yang
373b5(mdo): yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag thams cad mkhyend te de// bzod// ma nas ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa dang / 
373b6(mdo): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes dang / bral ba dang yi ge myed pa dang / sgra myed par shes so// ji ltar shes pa de bzhin tu rno bar grol ste// bcings pa yang myed grol ba yang myed/ de mnye ba nyid 'di yang byis pa so so'i skye bo
373b7(mdo): ngag gis/ khong du chud pas de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o// snyam tu sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ nam mkha' ni mnyam pa 'ang ma yin/ 
373b8(mdo): myi mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ myi mnyam pa 'ang ma yin no// chos gang la yang dag par yongasasu 'grub pa myed de/ mnyam pa 'am myi mnyam par brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
374a1(mdo): chos thams cad mnyam pa 'ang ma yin/ myi mnyam pa 'ang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ji ltar chos cung zad tsam ma nye bar yang myi byed/ myi mnyam par yang myi byed pa/ de ltar mngon
374a2(mdo): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// chos 'di dag ci 'dra ba de 'drangar bar/ yang dag pa'i shes pas shes so// yang dag pa'i shes pa yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni za ba myed pa yang ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa ste/ 
374a3(mdo): de dag ni ma 'byung ba las 'byung ba/ byung nas kyang bral ba'o// de dag ni rje myed par 'byung ba/ rje myed par bral ba'o// de ltar 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la brten nas 'jug kyang / 'di la 'jug pa gang yang myed de/ lam gcad
374a4(mdo): 'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond to// zhes kyang brjod do// lam chad pa de yang sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud par bya'o snyam du sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang
374a5(mdo): chub ces bya ba de ni ji lta ba bzhin gi gnas so// de lta ba bzhin gyi/ gnas gang zhe na/ byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te// / de bzhin nyid las myi 'da'o// byang chub ji lta bar tshor ba dang / 'du shes
374a6(mdo): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las myi 'da'o// byang chub ji ltar sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gyi khams kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las myi
374a7(mdo): 'da'o// byang chub ji lta bar myig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang / de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las myi 'da'o// byang chub ji lta bar rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams
374a8(mdo): dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sA'i rno bar shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / 
374b1(mdo): reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi zhe par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las myi 'da'o// chos su btags pa ni 'di dag tu
